story:
• Case Studies are an effective way of getting a safety message across.
  • The best people to spread a safety message are seafarers themselves.

MAC videos allow seafarers to download and spread the safety message to their shipmates and fellow mariners for free and legally. It even gives them the opportunity to get their names on the video credits through a modest donation.

We know how expensive video production can be for P&I Clubs and shipping companies. Supporting MAC videos may be a more cost effective way to get a message across. 

Here's what our new crowdfunder covers:

"Overreliance on electronic navigation is also a rising safety concern. Lessons learned from accident reports related to key technologies such as Electronic Chart Information and Display System are not always being filtered back into the training environment"

Allianz Shipping Review 2015


The Case of the Incurious Navigator is the second crowdfunded maritime safety video to be produced by the respected Maritime Accident Casebook. It is a unique initiative that gives you the chance to make navigation safer by encouraging seafarers to download, copy and share the video among their colleagues and friends.

In this video MAC looks at the improper use of ECDIS, inadequate training and other issues that lead to the grounding of the chemical tanker Ovit in September 2013.

The Case of the Incurious Navigator

It was 19 minutes before the Officer of the Watch of the Malta-flagged chemical tanker Ovit realised that his vessel was aground on the well-marked Varne Bank in the Dover Strait.  'Jail-bars' over the image on the monitor of the Electronic Chart Display and Information System had tried to warn him that it was using the wrong scale chart but he didn't know what they meant and no-one had been curious enough to find out.

The inexperienced third office who prepared the passage plan did not recognise warnings raised by the ECDIS screen when he did his work.

Nobody was curious about the fact that not once had the ECDIS issued an audible alert since it was installed because it had not been properly configured.

Add to that undermanned Channel Navigation Information Service operators who were unskilled and distracted.

This lesson-rich video looks at what went wrong and how to avoid similar incidents.

It will be professionally produced with quality sound, 3D and 2D animation and graphics.

Funding will cover recording and editing audio in a professional studio, preparation of 3D and 2D graphics and animation, video editing, formatting for different media, programming app for IoS, Android and Windows platform, placement in Google Play and Apple iTunes, website for delivery of DVD writable version and MP4 USB-deployable media.

How Will It Be Used?

  • Ships' Officers can include it is their safety briefings.
  • Seafarers can share it among themselves.
  • Seafarer organisations can distribute it to their members.
  • Port State Control personnel can give on the spot safety education.
  • P&I Clubs can distribute it to their members.
  • Shipowners and managers can distribute it to their fleet electronically.
  • On Smartphone, Tablet, Online, On USB Stick.

Who?

Bob Couttie, well known in maritime safety circles, will supervise and act as producer. He administers Maritime Accident Casebook, which reaches a minimum of 15,000 a month and has guided its development since 2006 and manages the 9,000-strong Maritime Investigation Group on Linkedin. His social media activities reach an audience of some 60,000 seafarers.

He is an ambassador for the Confidential Hazardous Incident Reporting Programme, CHIRP, and Nautical Institute Maritime Accident Reporting Scheme joint programme in ASEAN. He brings to the project more than a decade of experience in writing, voicing producing and directing maritime safety videos and video case studies. drawing on his background in film and radio drama and documentaries and experience in maritime journalism with publications such as Lloyd's List.

Backing up Bob Couttie's efforts is a team of industry professionals, from well-experienced master mariners to senior executives of some of the largest shipping firms in the world.

What We Need & What You Get


We are asking for $7,000 to make the seven minute video. This is significantly less than the typical market rate of $1,500 to $3,000 per finished minute and is possible because we can leverage lower cost production while maintaining quality. Donors will get their name on screen with producer, co-producer or acknowledgement credits and mentions in all publicity materials. It's a good way to increase your visibility in the industry and promote your company.

Note: Those who donated to the MAC crowdfunder iast year will be included in the acknowledgements.

Should we exceed our target the funding will be put towards our next production which will cover confined spaces.

The Impact

The intended impact is a reduction in ECDIS-related incidents based on stronger awareness of the elements that create an accident.

Other Ways You Can Help

Another way for you to help is to simply distribute the video to colleagues in the industry and encourage them to do so.

story:
The Gentlemen's Retreat

In the Bronx, there is an obsession with the word Gangsta and the letter G.  

Gangsta equates with a sense of false power and control; a life of reckless choices, and perhaps, mistakes.

Many Bronx youth have never been stimulated to see the the world beyond their own concrete neighborhoods.  

It is the mission of The Gentlemen's Retreat to offer Bronx youth a space outside the confines of inner city culture and geography.

The Gentlemen's Retreat offers inner city youth the opportunity to still be “G,” but in a positive sense.  “G” now stands for gentleman -  a man who treats others  in a proper and polite way with a sense of social status and sophistication. 

Goal: To introduce St. Raymond‘s High School juniors and seniors to narrative work and other workshops/topics that will help them succeed in life, and ultimately, cultivate them into gentlemen. 

Selected high school students will participate in a three day retreat that explores self-identity, storytelling, college essay writing, financial literacy, and other practical workshops to ensure personal and professional success.

Location: Providence College,  Providence, Rhode Island

Time/Duration: Friday morning, the 14th to Sunday afternoon, the 16th, August 2015

Gentlemen's Retreat Workshops include:

  • Relational Leadership

  • Networking for Success

  • How to Be an Entrepreneur

  • Prezi Training 

  • How to Be Successful in College

  • The Power of Language

  • Storytelling 

  • How to Properly Interview & Design Your Resume

  • Journaling

  • Understanding Identity 

  • Financial Literacy 

Activities/Free Time:

Golf, ball‐er‐cise, lounge activities, Painting with Peace love (http://peacelovestudios.com/), Speaker series (Mohamed Kamara), Judo training, CrossFit, and exploring Providence, RI. 


The Founder & His Inspiration...

The Gentlemen's Retreat is a life-long dream of Kenneth Chabert, an Bronx native who chose to leave the city for the pursuit of a different life. 

Chabert's Martin Luther King Jr. scholarship brought him to Providence College, where he was afforded opportunities to pursue a degree in Business and Leadership. While in college, he owned two barber shops in NYC and pursued an entrepreneurial venture with a clothing line. In 2010, Kenneth’s personal story of life-changing events entitled, “Squeeze,” was aired on Rhode Island Public Radio’s This I Believe.

More recently, Kenneth was chosen as “A Brave One” by Leadercast, the largest leadership conference in the world. This featured documentary highlights Kenneth’s journey from his neighborhood in the Bronx to becoming one of the few Prezi Experts in the United States. This story was told to an in-house audience of 6,000 of some of the top leaders in the United States, including a worldwide audience of over 100,000 people. The story was featured among great speakers such as Aja Brown, Mayor of Compton, Malala Yousafzai, Nobel-Peace Prize winner, Peyton Manning, Super Bowl winning quarterback and 5-time NFL MVP, Seth Godin, Innovative thinker and best-selling author, and Ed Catmull, President of Pixar Disney Animations Studio.


Funding Breakdown:

$3,874- Hotel for two days at Biltmore in Providence, RI

10 doubles for 20 kids (2 in each room) and 3 singles for guidance counselors

$2,500 - Breakfast/Lunch/Dinner for 2 days

3 workshop facilitators, 20 students, and 3 guidance counselors each day 

for Breakfast and Lunch

20 Students and 3 guidance counselors for dinner each night. 

$1,000- Day in Newport Tour of Mansions and Dinner 

Tours of five mansions-$20 each student and $30 for each adult

Students and Three adults totals= $500

Dinner for 20 students x $25= $500

$1850-Payment for Workshops

1. $900-Payment for (9) Workshop providers

2. $900-Conference rooms at Biltmore Hotel & Providence College

3. $50-Equipment rental 

$700 -Bus rental

story:
Stepping Into The Need

“To make the world stronger and more beautiful by ensuring every community has a qualified representative at the solutions table."

We fundamentally believe that to make the world better, we need a diverse and qualified group of people, contributing their unique perspective and communities needs at the solutions table. As a foundation, we believe that every community is interconnected, which means the challenges of one impacts all. Thus, interacting in diverse groups gives us an opportunity to come together, understand needs, share gifts, solve problems, experience struggles and create bonds that allow communities to persevere during times of crisis.

The SourceCode B46 Foundation was created to serve underrepresented communities by providing their children with educational opportunities that lead to them earning a seat at the nation's solutions tables. As a result, the funds raised from this campaign will help us fulfill 8 scholarships. These scholarships will allow elementary students to access summer educational opportunities with zero barriers. 

Our Journey

The SourceCode B46 Foundation was created in early 2015 by the founders of SourceCode B46, LLC (SCB46). Our journey started in 2012 with the creation of a volunteer program called the Fern Creek Coding Project. The goal of the program was to introduce 14 students from an underserved elementary school to the world of software coding.


Over the next 2 years, our volunteer program experienced tremendous growth. To maintain sustainability, we transitioned the program to SourceCode B46, LLC (SCB46) in 2014. Today, SCB46 provides a core skills development program that builds potential in elementary students through storytelling and software coding. Our services are used by Orange County Public Schools, the Orlando Science Center, the District of Columbia Department of Parks & Recreation Dept. and in homes across the state of Florida.

Still On Mission

SCB46 is growing, but we are still a small, self-funded and bootstrapped startup. Although earning revenue to sustain our growth is essential, the quest for it never blinds or distracts us from our mission to ensure every child, regardless of financial, physical or social limitations, has access to our services. As a result, we established the SourceCode B46 Foundation (501(c)3) as our philanthropic arm and a way for community partners and donors to walk with us on our mission.

Putting Your Gift To Work

During this fundraising campaign, we would like to raise $6,200. These funds will allow 8 elementary students to access quality programming this summer by eliminating financial and technical barriers. Each scholarship is valued at $775 and includes:

  • Full Tuition to the SourceCode B46 Online Summer Program. During the 8-week program (6/22 - 8/14), a team of six students and an instructor will work online to turn an idea into a story and then transform it into an animated movie by coding.
  • A Brand New Laptop Computer with Webcam. The laptop will allow students to access online sessions and their team.
  • 2 Months of High-Speed Internet Access. 
Any overages will be used to fund additional student scholarships. In the event that we do not meet our funding goals, student scholarships will still be awarded.

The Perks

All funders will receive a digital copy of scholarship student movies, a "I Made A Movie With Code" bracelet and the following perks:
  • $25: A SourceCode B46 thank you card.
  • $75: Closing credit listing in a scholarship student movie and thank you card.
  • $150: Closing credit listing in all scholarship student movies and thank you card.
  • $500: Peanut Butter & Jelly Award and closing credit listing in all scholarship student movies.
  • $1000: Peanut Butter & Jelly Award, closing credit producer listing and one SCB46 online program fully-paid and transferable voucher.


The Bigger Impact

Since 2014, SCB46 has reached over 800 students and continues to grow. Our work and unique method of building potential in elementary kids through storytelling and software coding resonates with learning guardians. As a result, our clients, such as Orange County Public Schools, the Orlando Science Center and the District of Columbia Department of Parks & Recreation Dept., trust us.

The  project-based learning curriculum that we deploy provides students with 8-weeks of rigorous instructions. Additionally, students learn co-working skills and enhance their potential in the following ways:

  • Build High-Level Thinking - The process of coding requires students to learn computational thinking skills, which are required to break down their stories and sequence them into an animated movie.

  • Comprehension of Academic Concepts - During the program, students are exposed to key State standard-aligned academic concepts in English language arts, math, history and science. These concepts are reinforced throughout the program, specifically during visualization exercises, such as storyboarding and movie creation.

  • Increase Confidence - Coding is highly rigorous and requires students to learn how to manage stress and overcome obstacles. Our program intentionally introduces points of failure into the process followed by opportunities to reassess and move forward.

  • Early Exposure - If students become interested in storyboarding, creative writing, film or software coding, early exposure helps them begin the accumulation of the 10,000 hours required to become proficient (Gladwell, Malcolm (2008). Outliers. Little, Brown and Company), thus making them more competitive when entering the workforce.

Other Ways You Can Help

Funding is not the only way you can have impact. You can help us reach our funding goal by sharing our campaign and message with anyone who believes that we can...

“Make the world stronger and more beautiful by ensuring every community has a qualified representative at the solutions table."

story:
Short Summary

Force for Kindness is an evidenced based but new and unique idea for anti-bullying instruction and curriculum.  It is one of the programs of the Force for Health Foundation that uses the healthforce (one word) app to make media come alive for mental, physical, or spiritual health. The program includes quick, easy, fun activities to revamp and reestablish your school’s climate and culture related to preventing and stopping bullying. Concepts include reinforcing how to recognize, report, and effectively deal with bullying incidents. Be a Force for Kindness follows current trends in education and technology, is fun for kids, and easy for the teacher. It is an effective way to revisit concepts already established by district’s anti-bullying policies and programs. This was created for elementary school use and created by the validated Olweus Bully education program trained educators and instructional designers, artists and musicians and tested in actual classroom and school settings.


Key Components/Characteristics:

- instruction based around ten anti-bullying related songs and accompanying                          interactive posters

- augmented reality posters that launch videos, and play music, as the poster comes alive with the app

- technology based (all resources available online and utilize mobile apps, multimedia, and music)

- music centered (kid friendly, more effective retention than text based only instruction )

- option for whole school and community involvement

- flexibility to make program your own/specific to district through extension activities (creating own songs, posters, and videos)

- content is designed to the interest level of a broad range of ages and community backgrounds

-user friendly for teachers and students

Materials Provided:

- free download of songs

- posters accompanying each song (for use with the Force Fields app)

- lesson plan guide for implementation

-log in accounts for the Student Health Force portal for access to poster galleries, lesson plans, worksheets, and training for students and parents.

- professional development webinar and available on site work shop and student assembly


We Need Your Help

  • We would like to raise $20,000. This money will go to production of posters, songs, printing work books, and distributing the product to schools. The goal is for as many schools to get materials as possible. The more money we raise the more schools we can give this amazing product too!
  • Many schools want the program, but do not have the budget for it
  • If we don't reach the goal we will have to make the schools pay for the program, and will only be able to produce as much as the budget allows.

The Impact

The impact of this campaign will be that elementary school students will be not only taught about bullying and its effects, but also though out the course of this program the students will be rewarded for helping other students and treating people with kindness. It will create a culture where kindness is the only thing that is excepted. 

  • This product is valuable because it will help to create a more positive atmosphere not only within our schools but within the next generation. 
  • This program has been used by Fritz Elementary School in Lancaster Pa. It has also been picked up by the Allentown YMCA for there summer children's program.
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

The risk that comes 

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you do not have the 

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.


Goals

We would like every school possible to have this program. That is why the goal is 20,000. All the money raised will go to giving schools that can't afford, or want this program the chance to have it for free. 

The stretch goal Is $1,000,000. We know it sounds like a lot, but the amount of good we can do for our youth would be something worth more than money. The entire country could become a force for kindness at all schools, clubs, and homes.

If you want it but can't afford it for a school, email Drrob@force4health.org and ask to be on the list.  If you wish to contribute and earmark it for a school, let Dr. Rob know the same way. If you have talent and wish to be part of the team to create more media for higher grades, tell us. 

Thank you for being a Force for Kindness.

Short Summary 
Force for Kindness is an evidenced based but new and unique idea for anti-bullying instruction and curriculum.  It is one of the programs of the Force for Health Foundation that uses the healthforce (one word) app to make media come alive for mental, physical, or spiritual health. The program includes quick, easy, fun activities to revamp and reestablish your school’s climate and culture related to preventing and stopping bullying. Concepts include reinforcing how to recognize, report, and effectively deal with bullying incidents. Be a Force for Kindness follows current trends in education and technology, is fun for kids, and easy for the teacher. It is an effective way to revisit concepts already established by district’s anti-bullying policies and programs. This was created for elementary school use and created by the validated Olweus Bully education program trained educators and instructional designers, artists and musicians and tested in actual classroom and school settings. 



Key Components/Characteristics:
- instruction based around ten anti-bullying related songs and accompanying                          interactive posters
- augmented reality posters that launch videos, and play music, as the poster comes alive with the app
- technology based (all resources available online and utilize mobile apps, multimedia, and music)
- music centered (kid friendly, more effective retention than text based only instruction )
- option for whole school and community involvement 
- flexibility to make program your own/specific to district through extension activities (creating own songs, posters, and videos)
- content is designed to the interest level of a broad range of ages and community backgrounds
-user friendly for teachers and students 
Materials Provided:
- free download of songs
- posters accompanying each song (for use with the Force Fields app)
- lesson plan guide for implementation 
-log in accounts for the Student Health Force portal for access to poster galleries, lesson plans, worksheets, and training for students and parents.
- professional development webinar and available on site work shop and student assembly
   We Need Your Help  We would like to raise $20,000. This money will go to production of posters, songs, printing work books, and distributing the product to schools. The goal is for as many schools to get materials as possible. The more money we raise the more schools we can give this amazing product too!
Many schools want the program, but do not have the budget for it If we don't reach the goal we will have to make the schools pay for the program, and will only be able to produce as much as the budget allows.    The Impact The impact of this campaign will be that elementary school students will be not only taught about bullying and its effects, but also though out the course of this program the students will be rewarded for helping other students and treating people with kindness. It will create a culture where kindness is the only thing that is excepted.   This product is valuable because it will help to create a more positive atmosphere not only within our schools but within the next generation.  This program has been used by Fritz Elementary School in Lancaster Pa. It has also been picked up by the Allentown YMCA for there summer children's program.
 Make it real for people and build trust.    Risks & Challenges The risk that comes   Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles. Describe your plan for solving these challenges.    Other Ways You Can Help If you do not have the   Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign. Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!   And that's all there is to it.GoalsWe would like every school possible to have this program. That is why the goal is 20,000. All the money raised will go to giving schools that can't afford, or want this program the chance to have it for free. The stretch goal Is $1,000,000. We know it sounds like a lot, but the amount of good we can do for our youth would be something worth more than money. The entire country could become a force for kindness at all schools, clubs, and homes. If you want it but can't afford it for a school, email Drrob@force4health.org and ask to be on the list.  If you wish to contribute and earmark it for a school, let Dr. Rob know the same way. If you have talent and wish to be part of the team to create more media for higher grades, tell us.  Thank you for being a Force for Kindness.

story:
Let's Bring Back the Gold Standard!

Mission Statement

Nonprofit Funds a 501c3 public charity promotes financial awareness of the difference between asset banking and fractional banking systems.  Our goal is to create educational awareness of how the worlds banking system works.  We will help design and teach people how to better handle their financial circumstances and create a safer financial environment for their future.

Nonprofit Funds will work individually with persons in need to help them better understand their financial capabilities, awareness and provide educational assistance in helping them to become aware of their own budgetary needs and how to accomplish those goals.  Our initial target are individuals residing in Texas and California but our goal is to expand the program to reach individuals around the world.

We will educate people about asset-backed banking including the formation of 501c14 credit unions.  The organization will provide education on the differences between banks and credit unions, how to fiscally handle funds in a responsible manner, how to differentiate between fractional banking and asset banking, etc.  Our intention is to educate individuals on ways to increase their purchasing power and earning power.

In addition, the organization will teach individuals about the various financial aspects of banking including budgeting, fiscally handling budgets, financial sustainability, and better handling of their money situation.  Our goal is to bring in individuals with banking backgrounds and an accountant to become part of the instructional classes.  To provide the education, the organization will set up internet classes; go to different facilities to meet, greet, and teach.

We will also provide support to educate and help individuals form their own 501c14 organizations and garner enough people to form the organization.  For instance, in the state of California it takes 500 people to form a credit union so we will teach individuals how to attain this number of individuals.  Nonprofit Funds will not supply monies to form 501c14 organizations.  We will conduct this education through our online school located at http://nonprofitfunds.nonprofitbank.org/education/

_____________________________________________________________________________

The Problem we Face

Governments keep printing unbacked money. Then the bankers get their hands on it and create even more unbacked capital by using fractional banking.  If the governments and financial institutions of the world won't fix the fractional banking and quantitative easing problems then the people will!

The Solution

All future customers of NonprofitBank.org will have their money backed with gold or silver; Your purchasing power will be the amount of  gold or silver you have in your account which will be sold at the live rate when you use your debit card.

What we are Doing to Revolutionize Banking

NonprofitBank.org is being built by the people and owned by the people through the nonprofit charity Nonprofit Funds 501c3 used to educate and organize co-op groups of people then help them form asset backed credit unions.

_____________________________________________________________________________

Donate Now!

Help us help you build a NonprofitBank 100% backed by gold and silver.

Creating an Asset Backed Credit Union in Texas

Learn how to create Asset Backed Credit Union in Texas.  Course includes bylaws, insurance, compliance and  everything necessary to open and operate a asset backed credit union owned by it's members. 


Creating an Asset Backed Credit Union in California

Learn how to create Asset Backed Credit Union in California.  Course includes bylaws, insurance, compliance and  everything necessary to open and operate a asset backed credit union owned by it's members. 

_____________________________________________________________________________

Perks

Support Nonprofit Funds 501c3 public charity by donating any amount. But if you donate $25 or more you will receive the following perks based on donation.

 1. Donate $25 and receive a bag of solar roasted coffee.  SolarCoffee.co specializes in roasting coffee beans using natural sunlight. Their parabolic dish magnifies the sun to perfectly roast each bean.
2. Donate $100 or more and receive a Coil Backpack, a must-have, with its 18" x 15" x 6" dimensions, this backpack features a large zippered main compartment for storing  gear.  The zippered front pocket gives you quick access to items like your cell phone, sunglasses, or keys; and dual side water bottle pockets keep drinks within easy reach. Plus there is even a headphone port. 
3. Donate $500 or more and receive five ounces of pure silver.  Stock up on silver while it remains inexpensive.  Plus receive a bag of Solar Coffee and  the NonprofitBank.org backpack.  Five ounce silver bar may differ from picture based on market availability.
4. Donate $1000 or more and receive ten ounces of pure silver.  Stock up on silver while it remains inexpensive.  Plus receive a bag of Solar Coffee and  the NonprofitBank.org backpack.  Ten ounce silver bar may differ from picture based on market availability.
 

 5. Donate $1500 or more and receive Apple Watch Sport 42 mm Silver Aluminum Case with white sport band.  Plus receive a bag of Solar Coffee and  the NonprofitBank.org backpack. 

6.  Donate $2500 or more and receive one troy ounce of pure gold.  Stock up on gold while it remains inexpensive.  Plus receive a bag of Solar Coffee and  the NonprofitBank.org backpack. One ounce gold bar may differ from picture based on market availability.
_____________________________________________________________________________

Can't Give Cash? Donate Time Instead!

Join NonprofitBank.org

Nonprofit Bank is currently looking for motivated people to get involved. We need your in kind support! We need the following types of talent: qualified board members, lawyers, web developers, bankers, precious metal traders, accountants, insurance specialist, security specialist, donation finders, event coordinators (golf Tournaments, Banquets Etc.) and much much more. If you feel you have any of these talents or feel you can bring something new to the table please apply to join the team.

Join Team
Join Fund Raising

Nonprofit Bank is currently looking for people to get involved in promoting our vision of asset backed banking through your fund raising connections.

Join Fund Raising Team
Join Social Networking Team

Nonprofit Bank is currently looking for people to get involved in promoting our vision of asset backed banking through your social media connections. The more people you have in your social networks the better! Come help us promote asset backed banking.

Join Social Networking Team

_____________________________________________________________________________ADDITIONAL WAYS YOU CAN HELP 

  • Share this campaign with people you know who care about asset backed higher banking education and finding a better way (Or who just think it is pretty cool that some folks are starting their own asset backed banking college.) Here's the link to share: http://nonprofitbank.org

  • We are on Facebook and Twitter (and  LinkedIn and all those cool places). Find us there. Follow us. Like us. Invite your friends to do it too.

  • If you want to get updates as we grow, sign up for our email list and we will send you those updates right to your Inbox. Invite your friends to do the same.

_____________________________________________________________________________MEDIA AND PRESS RELEASE

FOR IMMIDIATE RELEASE

Gold is Money, everything else is credit

HOUSTON, TEXAS, August 6th, 2015 – In 1912 JP Morgan used the words “Gold is Money, everything else is credit”. It’s been NonProfit Funds experience that in banking” Credit is everything, and nothing else matters”. We want to change that and put the power of banking back in the people’s hands.

Nonprofit Funds has been formed to teach and assist people from all walks of life, be they high income, moderate income or low to very low income families and individuals a basic understanding on the need to keep a budget and why keeping a budget is paramount to success in life.

We teach the differences between Fiat Currencies in banking today and why Asset Backed Banking/Credit Unions are necessary in today’s economical climate.

We also teach what we believe will be the change from Fiat Currencies to a standard that has always worked in the past before big government decided to start printing money without backing it with gold and silver. We teach how to start an asset backed Credit Union, 100% backed by Gold and Silver.

Our classes include:

History of Money – From the beginning to current
How to keep and maintain a budget at any income level – introductory
How to start your own Asset Backed Credit Union – Forms and instructions

Research us further

Indiegogo campaign at:  http://igg.me/at/nonprofitfunds/

www.nonprofitfunds.org  also www.nonprofitbank.org  and or communicate with us at:

Facebook.com/nonprofitfunds 

Twitter; @nonprofit_funds


PUBLISHED IN...

http://www.independent.com/pr/2015/aug/10/gold-...

_____________________________________________________________________________YOU'VE GOT QUESTIONS. WE'VE GOT ANSWERS. 

Is my contribution to Nonprofit Funds tax deductible?

Yes, as the law allows! On June 25 2014 Nonprofit Funds received its official 501c3 status... Nonprofit Funds now qualifies for an exemption from federal and state taxes IRS conformation  when you donate to our campaign, you will receive a receipt for your tax exempt donation amount (your contribution minus the value of the perks you have chosen).  

How will I get my perks?

We will be sending a request at the close of the campaign to ask you for your shipping address. We intend to give out rewards within 30 days from receiving funds from Indiegogo campaign. 

What if I don't want to receive any perks? 

Please fee free to donate any amount without perks.  You will get the donation receipt  for the full amount of your donation, and our deepest appreciation

_____________________________________________________________________________THANK YOU!

No, really, thank you! We can't do this without you and are so glad you have chosen to join us. Please tell us about yourself. Who you are. What intrigues you about us.

story:
In 2015 I was awarded a Global Youth Ambassador Fellowship through Planned Parenthood Global. Through this Fellowship, I visited Tan Ux’il, a non-profit organization in Flores, Peten, Guatemala. Tan Ux’il is Maya-Itzá word meaning, “we are growing.”  They do incredibly comprehensive and innovative sexual and reproductive health education in over 14 communities in the state of Peten. Their network of young promotores and youth peer providers “health promotores” not only do sexual and reproductive health education but even distribute some birth control methods like condoms, the pill, and a monthly birth control shot. Some of the communities are so remote that they take up to 4 hours driving to get there.


They also have a bi-weekly radio program called “Codigo Cero,” (Code zero) in which they talk about sexual and reproductive health. Their tagline, “Hablamos en serio, educación sin misterio,” meaning, “let’s talk for real, education without the mystery,” is no joke, as no topic is off limits, from masturbation to dismantling the patriarchy. They talk about all of it. They receive anonymous questions via text, fb, and even by phone. The work they do is so revolutionary, that when the show first began in 2002, they received threats of violence for even saying the word, “sex.” Now, schools and other community organizations take time from their schedules to tune into the show.


In order to train their network of promotores and peer providers, Tan Ux’il invites 90 youth to a 5 day camp.  During the camp, youth learn about sexual and reproductive health, leadership, and community building. They use interactive and affective teaching techniques. I have not seen such incredible methods used since those used by my graduate school professors at Widener University.


The youth camp is 5 days long and aims to do the following:


  • Proactive leadership transformation

  • Adopt  best practices as it applies to safer sex and drug use

  • Behavior change for gender equity

  • Increased knowledge and skills

  • Greater awareness of the topics addressed

  • Personal commitment to the issue

  • Exchange of experiences for collective learning

  • Responsible decision making as their own agents of change



Recently, they have also taken on the task of educating about consent and rape culture to specifically as it applies to rape and incest, including access to emergency contraception after an assault. Currently, 80% of reported rape cases are insest, of those, 30% of the cases the father is the perpetrator. Many of these cases the survivor is only 12 or 13 years old.


The work they are doing is truly innovative and they are changing lives every day.


Recently, they’ve had to cut back on expenses, one of which is their Youth Camp. This has come as a blow to both the organization and their network of volunteers, as this is the one time a year that they all get together as well as train the volunteers since their service area is so large. Not once have they visited a community and not had an aspiring promotor run up and ask when the next camp will be.


This is where you come in. I need your help raising funds so that Tan Ux’il can still run their camp this year. They need $7,500 (Q 57,423.75) to run a camp for 90 participants.


This will pay for transportation, food, housing, materials, and the cost to rent the campgrounds for 5 days.


That is approximately $84 dollars per participant, a cost that is prohibitive for every participant.


I know that $84 is a lot to ask, but any little bit helps. Even if we cannot raise the full funds, even being partially funded will allow them to run the camp, even with less participants.


Those of you who know me, know how important sexual health education, especially for latinos, is to me. To have them open their doors to allow me to come see their work, is something I am incredibly grateful for. They were hoping to learn from me, but in reality, they taught me so much, and more so, renewed my love and energy for the work that I do. They are truly an inspiration. I asked them what they needed the most help with, and ensuring they have a camp this year is their top priority. Please help if you can.

story:
Summary

I will join a delegation to Kyiv*, Ukraine as a Tech Advisor, to help lead an interactive workshop on Online Collaboration and Management for leaders from women's civic organizations across Ukraine working to address critical issues: gender-based violence, trafficking in persons, and support to Internally Displaced Persons

The delegation trip is led by WAKE - Women's Alliance for Knowledge Exchange - whose founders are a former Senior Director of TechWomen, an Initiative of the U.S. Department of State's Bureau of Educational and Cultural Affairs and a former Executive Director at the Institute for International Education.


Mission

What if love and caring for others had no boundaries of in and out - instead we could share our kindness with every individual and in every experience we encounter - and make the world a more positive place?

That's the world I hope to create one step at a time, with your help - I cannot do it alone. 


What I Need 

  • Round Trip flight from San Francisco  ~$1,200
  • Hotel ~ $750
  • Meals and Incidentals ~$250
  • Participation Costs [covers group meals, receptions, local group transportation & coordination] ~$800
Any participation helps - whether it's $5 or $50- your participation makes an impact!


The Impact

With your support, you will amplify the voices of Ukrainian women and empower women around the globe. 

  • When a woman succeeds, a family succeeds
  • When a family succeeds, a community succeeds
  • When a community succeeds, a nation succeeds
  • When a nation succeeds, humanity succeeds


Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially but feel inspired by this initiative, there are other valuable ways to participate!

  • Get the word out! Share how this campaign and the Women's Alliance for Knowledge Exchange [WAKE] inspire you to make an impact on global development - on Twitter, Facebook, Blogs, Medium, your company's .ORG initiative, professional groups, networking groups, and social groups!
  • Best and easiest part, use the plug-and-play Indiegogo share tools!

*Kiev in English

Summary

I will join a delegation to Kyiv*, Ukraine as a Tech Advisor, to help lead an interactive workshop on Online Collaboration and Management for leaders from women's civic organizations across Ukraine working to address critical issues: gender-based violence, trafficking in persons, and support to Internally Displaced Persons
The delegation trip is led by WAKE - Women's Alliance for Knowledge Exchange - whose founders are a former Senior Director of TechWomen, an Initiative of the U.S. Department of State's Bureau of Educational and Cultural Affairs and a former Executive Director at the Institute for International Education.


Mission
What if love and caring for others had no boundaries of in and out - instead we could share our kindness with every individual and in every experience we encounter - and make the world a more positive place?
That's the world I hope to create one step at a time, with your help - I cannot do it alone. 


What I Need   Round Trip flight from San Francisco  ~$1,200
Hotel ~ $750
Meals and Incidentals ~$250
Participation Costs [covers group meals, receptions, local group transportation & coordination] ~$800

Any participation helps - whether it's $5 or $50- your participation makes an impact!   
The Impact 
With your support, you will amplify the voices of Ukrainian women and empower women around the globe. 

When a woman succeeds, a family succeeds
When a family succeeds, a community succeeds
When a community succeeds, a nation succeeds
When a nation succeeds, humanity succeeds



    Other Ways You Can Help If you cannot contribute financially but feel inspired by this initiative, there are other valuable ways to participate!  
Get the word out! Share how this campaign and the Women's Alliance for Knowledge Exchange [WAKE] inspire you to make an impact on global development - on Twitter, Facebook, Blogs, Medium, your company's .ORG initiative, professional groups, networking groups, and social groups!
 Best and easiest part, use the plug-and-play Indiegogo share tools!   *Kiev in English

story:
Self Sustaining Enterprises

We launch sustainable marketplace initiatives that meet the physical and spiritual needs of our world.  In contrast to a typical ministry, our organization does not seek ongoing donations for any specific project.  All of our projects seek launching funds and rely on a sustainability model for ongoing growth.  Our current project is The Global Impact Experience.

Global Impact Experience

The Global Impact Experience uses experiential learning simulations to provide a brand new way to engage in global communities by offering experiences that are local, safe, and affordable.  International relief trips are life changing, but too many people are deterred by the time, cost, and safety risks.  Experiential learning simulations open individual's eyes to global lifestyles while engaging those unlikely to invest in developing countries.  The first, in a series of experiential learning simulations, will be the African Village.

The African Village

The African Village will be the first in a series of experiential learning simulations as a part of the Global Impact Experience.  We will run a series of 3 day camps, simulating life in specific parts of Africa, designed to  give participants an emotional investment in developing countries.  After experiencing The African Village, participants will not only be given a life changing perspective on the world but also the ability to serve others through:

  • Child Sponsorship
  • Project Sponsorship
  • Site Sponsorship - Including international relief trips
***We partner with missions sending organizations in order to minister to the physical and spiritual needs of our world***

What We Need & What You Get

We need financial funding and social awareness.

We need to raise $45,000 by asking 180 people to pledge between $50 and $1,000 in order for us to reach our goal and launch our camps in the summer of 2016.

  • Shower House - $2,000
  • Animals, fencing and Housing - $6,000
  • Huts - 4 Additional - $12,000 ($3,000 Each)
  • 10 small marketplace huts, including merchandise and equipment - $5000
  • Staff - First two summers - $10,000
  • Sponsored summer interns - $10,000
You will receive a few gifts based on levels of support
  • Pledge $50 and you will receive authentic african jewelry.
  • Pledge $100 and you will receive authentic african jewelry, and a personalized name plaque to be displayed at the African Village. 
  • Pledge $250 and you will receive authentic african jewelry, a personalized name plaque to be displayed at the African VIllage, and half off admission to the 2016 african village experience.
  • Pledge $500 and you will receive half off admission to the 2016 african village experience, and a catered dinner at the village.
  • Pledge $1,000 and you will receive complimentary admission to the 2016 african village experience, a catered dinner at the village, and entered to win a complimentary missions trip for two.
  • Pledge $10,000 and you will automatically receive a complimentary missions trip for two and two huts dedicated to the name of your choice.

The Impact

The Global Impact Experience will challenge the perspective of participants in hopes of invoking a desire to invest in the lives of others, in their community, and around the world.  In addition to being a mechanism that brings about change at home and abroad, the initiative will also generate funds that support orphans and widows all around the world.

  • Those contributing to this campaign will be a part of reshaping the way people see the world and how participants engage in international relief.
  • This Global Impact Experience will open individual's eyes to the needs around the world, influence people to get involved overseas, and make a difference in the lives of young people all around the world.
  • We have launched many self sustaining initiatives that are impacting lives in Cincinnati, Ohio through the marketplace.  Ex. Crossfit Superfly, Trinity Salon & Spa and Elements Pro Lawn Care.

Risks and Challenges

There are many partnerships that are being developed to ensure an authentic experience for our first experiential learning simulation, The African Village.  We are developing agreements with local farmers to assist in animal maintenance, as well as agreements with African foundations for native staff and volunteers. We are reaching out to youth, college, and adult groups from all over the Ohio region to attend the camp.  We may face challenges throughout these partnerships, but with your help, we can change the way people invest in the world around them.

  • We are connected to many faith based organizations, non-profit organizations, and for profit businesses all over the city who are excited to see this project come to fruition.
  • Our plan is to continue cultivating and developing our key relationships, offer significant ownership in our venture to those who play a key role in launching, and to always give credit to our Heavenly Father for everything we do.

Other Ways You Can Help

For those of you who love our mission and lack the means to contribute, we would love to have an advocate sharing all of our Facebook posts, tweets, and links online!

  • Please help us get the word out by forwarding all of our posts!
  • All of our social media will be on this site so please use the Indiegogo tools to share our posts.

Thanks for reading!

story:
GO TO NEW CAMPAIGN

 

Clicca qui per Italiano!

I am sure you know that only few people in the world achieve their dreams and all the others are working for them so You have to start say Yes to your Life. I encourage you to change that and before you die don't leave dreams behind.

 

What's Your Dream?

Start Achieving Your Dream

Imagine your dream, write it down, read it, watch it, listen to it and expect it to happen. No confusion, no expensive and difficult process without loosing your faith and motivation.

Introducing our new invention that will help you reach your dream with a personal agenda. It will help you do exercises on a daily basis to achieve your dream. Join us in this life changing campaign. 

"A dream is just a dream. A goal is a dream with a plan and a deadline." — Harvey Mackay

 

 

INDEX


WHO IS THIS FOR?
WHAT YOU GET?
WHY DO YOU NEED IT?
HOW DOES IT WORK?
WHERE YOUR MONEY GOES?

 

Earn for everyone you invite

 If you refer anyone you can get 1 FREE copy every 10 copies sold with your invitation or 10% of the contribution. IT'S NOT MLM, it's just saying thanks for your help, so look below the main video to share your unique URL.

 

Copy your unique URL link to post around the Internet and save it for later by clicking the link icon circled below. Read more

 

Others are talking about us and we would love to talk about you

 

 

 

WHO IS THIS FOR?

 
Remember those dreams you had when you were a kid? As children we played many imaginative games. We became explorers, astronauts, emulated our favorite sports champions, movie stars and storybook idols.  What do you dream?

 

Do you want the best for your family? Do you aspire to become a community leader and role model? Do you dream of dong what you want when you want? Do you have a secret wish to accomplish? Do you live the fantasies you could only dream of?


If you thing that:
  • "it will never work for me" (You never developed a game plan to succeed.)
  • "it will take too much time" (You’re too busy answering other peoples’ orders.)
  • "this is too difficult, I don’t have the discipline to carry it out? (You don’t need the discipline! That’s where we come in!)"
  • "it would take a lot of work? (It requires no more effort than it takes to complete a popular magazine’s personality test!) 
  • "I am too busy to take advantage of it" (It takes no more time than going to the movie theatre or a sporting event once a year!) 
  • "it would cost too much? (You’re probably already paying for it!)
  • well... We don't just want you to back the campaign though, we want you to join our community and be a part of making history.

It's for people like you, that is not achieving goals in life and that is living someone else dream. It's for people like you who truly believe that your dream is possible and necessary and willing to do whatever it takes to achieve it.

The most famous behavioral scientists have discovered people’s aversion to loss usually trumps the potential for reward. The joy of accomplishment motivates you towards achieving your Dream but powerful demotivators keep you stuck. 

Give it a Try

 

 

 

WHAT YOU GET?

We’ve put together an exciting set of perks around the mission of helping people imagining their dream and achieving their goals in life.

 

 

 

€1: BUY 1 PDF BOOK + HELP OTHERS

 

 

Show your support and get the following:

  • 1 Book Copy in PDF - your name will be added in the book acknowledgments. The book is fully customizable with your notes in Acrobat.
  • Donation - your name will be sent to the charity organization and we will donate 100% of the PROFIT to help people with no hope.
  • Digital Celebration - we will send you a digital thank you message in all social media that you can use to show your support for the campaign.
 

 

€15: EASY PERSONALISED BOOK + COUPON

Hurry up to get the following:

  • 1 Paper Book Copy - with 30% dicount on the normal price and more than 50% on retail price. On top your name will be added in the book acknowledgments. The book is fully customizable with your notes.
  • Donation - your name will be sent to the charity organization and we will donate 100% of the PROFIT to help people with no hope.
  • Digital Celebration - we will send you a digital thank you message in all social media that you can use to show your support for the campaign.

 

In addition to this, you will get a coupon to book the accomodations managed by Mondosol.

 

In our site www.mondosol.com you can book one of our accommodations getting back the money you spent for no more than 5% of the total spend and experience a holiday dream of your life. Check the instructions under here and inside the book.

 

Get access to this revolutionary educational book so you can personalize it on your own and test it to achieve your goals in your life.

This will get your hands on a book that could have a profound global impact, months before anyone else gets to use it.

It doesn't stop there...you will also get:

 

  • Extended Digital Content - as part of the crowdfunding campaign we will be releasing special digital content including material from celebrities such as Les Brown, Sir. Richard Branson, Eric Thomas, Tony Robbins, and more!
  • Make your book on Amazon - get a chance to publish your book on Amazon so your friends and family can buy a copy and you can become a famous author!
  • Credit in the book - your name will be added to the acknowledgments section as a credit.
 

Check inside the Kindle book to see the content of the Agenda Standard Edition.

Our generous invention will help you reach your dream with a personal agenda. It will give you the exercises to do on a daily basis to achieve your dream with a step-by-step process that can be used to master anything.

This perk includes the previous details of the EARLY BIRD print copy of the book at the regular price, without shipping and 10% profit donation to charities of the total amout raised by the campaign.

    In addition to this, you will also get a Personalisation of your own book in limited edition with your name as author and in the acknowledgments, your picture on the front cover. If you are looking for the same service it costs $199.

     

    You will also get live video streaming access to Imagine Your Dream event where you can watch and learn how to use the agenda, discuss and debate with the team any of your ideas. This, combined with your change to publish it in Amazon provides a wonderful opportunity to influence how the future "Imagine Your Dream" book will look like.

     

    In addition to this perk cost you will pay  extra for the shipping.

     

     

     

    €17: BUY 1 GIVE 1 BOOK + COUPON

     

    Receive the above details:
    • 2 Paper Book Copies with 15% OFF
    • Donation of 10%
    • Digital Celebration
    • Make Your Book in Amazon
    • Credit in the Book
    • Extended Digital Content
    • Holiday Coupon
    • Live Video Streaming Access to Imagine Your Dream event

    We have partnered with the charity ONLUS Il sorriso dei miei bimbi to create a better enviroment for children in the favelas of Brasil. Everytime you get this perk we will donate 10% of the perk value to this charity.

     

    Note: If you want you can donate your extra copy to the charity even later.

    This book is available in different design edition:

    • Yoga
    • Travel
    • People
    • House
    • Food
    • City
    If you don't want to donate to this charity 10% of your money or one of the book copy you purchase, you can suggest another charity and your book copy can be sent to that charity or the person you like the most!

     

    In addition to this perk cost you will pay  extra for the shipping.

     

     

     

    €25: BUY 1 GIVE 1 OWN BOOK + COUPON

     

    Receive the above details:

    • 2 Paper Book Copies of your Easy personalised edition with 15% OFF
    • Donation of 10%
    • Digital Celebration
    • Make Your Book in Amazon
    • Credit in the Book
    • Extended Digital Content
    • Holiday Coupon
    • Live Video Streaming Access to Imagine Your Dream event

    We have partnered with the charity ONLUS Il sorriso dei miei bimbi to create a better enviroment for children in the favelas of Brasil. Everytime you get this perk we will donate 10% of the perk value to this charity.

     

     

    In addition to this perk cost you will pay  extra for the shipping.

     
     

    €50: BUY 3 GIVE 3 BOOKS + COUPON

     

    Receive the above details:
    • 6 Paper Book Copies with 15% OFF
    • Donation of 10%
    • Digital Celebration
    • Make Your Book in Amazon
    • Credit in the Book
    • Extended Digital Content
    • Holiday Coupon
    • Live Video Streaming Access to Imagine Your Dream event
    In addition to this you will be sent the revised Kindle edition of the New York Times Bestselling book, Live Your Dreams by Les Brown.

     

     

     

     

     

    In addition to this perk cost you will pay  extra for the shipping.

     

    €70: BUY 5 GIVE 5 BOOKS + COUPON

    Receive the above details:

     

    • 10 Paper Book Copies with 30% OFF
    • Donation of 10%
    • Digital Celebration
    • Make Your Book in Amazon
    • Credit in the Book
    • Extended Digital Content
    • Holiday Coupon
    • Live Video Streaming Access to Imagine Your Dream event
    • Copy of Live Your Dreams by Les Brown

    In addition to this you give access to the Imagine Your Dream for your school. This will include 20 copies of the PDF book that you can test, use, and explore with kids in your local area.

    This does not require usage at a school: if you would prefer to purchase this perk for another group such as scouts, clubs, societies, user groups, or others, that is welcomed!

       

      On top you will get a Holiday Gift Card with a Tour Guide for the incredible Holiday of your dream, organized and run by the Super Host, Entrepreneur and Philanthropist, Elio Mondello Co founder of Mondosol.

      In collaboration with the best apartments, bnbs, hotels in Italy featured in Mondosol wishlist of Airbnb. Thank-you, Airbnb!

       

      This perk also includes €17 travel credit with Airbnb if you open a new account, but you will pay  extra for the shipping.

       

      €150: BUY 5 GIVE 5 OWN BOOKS + COUPON

      Get all of the perks below plus:
      • 20 Paper Book Copies of your Complete Personal Edition with 50% OFF
      • Donation of 10%
      • Digital Celebration
      • Make Your Book in Amazon
      • Credit in the Book
      • Extended Digital Content
      • Holiday Coupon
      • Live Video Streaming Access to Imagine Your Dream event
      • Copy of Live Your Dreams by Les Brown

      In addition to this you get 2 VIP tickets to IMAGINE YOUR DREAM award ceremonies. Dates for these events will be announced later.

      These will be exclusive events with the teams, donors, celebrities, and public figures that have made the IMAGINE YOUR DREAM campaign possible. This will be a unique and remarkable opportunity to meet these people, network, and form future relationships.

      Please note: shipping, travel and accommodation is not included.

       

      €250: BE THE HERO OF THE COMMUNITY

      Get all of the perks below plus:
      • 30 Paper Book Copies donated to a school class + 1 for you
      • Donation of 10% for the school class
      • Digital Celebration
      • Make Your Book in Amazon
      • Credit in the Book
      • Extended Digital Content
      • Holiday Coupon
      • Live Video Streaming Access to Imagine Your Dream event
      • Copy of Live Your Dreams by Les Brown
      • 2 VIP tickets to IMAGINE YOUR DREAM award ceremonies

      In addition to this, your contribution will sponsor a school class and help provide the scholarship, food, transport, materials, and infrastructure to give the tool to achieve goals into the hands of real kids in real school classes.

       

       

      The effects of this perk are profound: it provides a concrete help for kids in need to make more and more improvements and ensure they can achieve their goals in life.

      When this experience has been completed, we will also send you a framed certificate acknowledging your sponsorship of a school class, and which class you sponsored. 

       

      In addition to this perk cost you will pay  extra for the shipping.

       

       

      €1,700: HELP CHILDREN + COUPON

      Get all of the perks at $250 and below plus:

       

       

      • 170 Paper Book Copies donated to school classes + 1 for you
      • Donation of 10% for the school class
      • Digital Celebration
      • Make Your Book in Amazon
      • Credit in the Book
      • Extended Digital Content
      • Holiday Coupon
      • Live Video Streaming Access to Imagine Your Dream event
      • Copy of Live Your Dreams by Les Brown
      • 2 VIP tickets to IMAGINE YOUR DREAM award ceremonies

       

      In addition to this you will be recognized and identified as a top-tier sponsor of the IMAGINE YOUR DREAM initiative. This is a small and select group and you will be recognized at both award ceremonies.

       

       

      This perk also includes a framed certificate acknowledging your sponsorship of a school classes, and which classes you sponsored. 

      In addition to this perk cost you will pay  extra for the shipping.

      Comment what you think about the perks and suggest your ideas.

       

       

       

      WHY DO YOU NEED IT?

       

      We all know that people like you need a tool to help you accomplish your DREAM and something to motivate you to take action every single day, because NO MATTER HOW BAD IT IS OR HOW BAD IT GETS YOU ARE GOING TO MAKE IT.


      We all know that having directions in life is crucial, so with this agenda you can get what you want in life. You need to set some goals, deadline and plan to achieve them with this agenda because YOU CAN IMAGINE AND LIVE YOUR DREAM.
       

      HOW DOES IT WORK?

      In order to appreciate how the "Imagine Your Dream" agenda works, it's important you understand the dynamic of goal settings, planning and positive affirmation. Achieving your goals depends on how hard you are working to improve.


      The easiest thing in your life is to achieve one of your goals and the most difficult thing is to believe that it can happen to you.
       


      In this agenda you write your name, your goals and plan to achieve them. Everyday for 365 days you will read them loud and write why you are successful and grateful in life. If you believe it you can see it.
       


      In this campaign you help yourself and millions of people to achieve personal and economic goals in life. On top, you help the members of Mondosol to develop this program and the startup company reaching even more people internationally.
       

       

      And when it comes to creating a book with me as an author, how is that done?

      Once you have picked one of the perk available to create your own agenda you will work together with the happy staff of Mondosol to get your book done. And you can have your front and back cover personalized, your name as an author on the cover and in the acknowledgements. If you want, you can also have a personal dedication and praise adding some pictures inside.
       

       

       

      Does everyone get the same book with very minor changes besides the author's name?

      Of course not, this book is created to be a personal agenda or diary so we can personalize all the outside and part of the inside of the book as you like. Also you need to write your personal manifesto and plan to achieve your dream. And you will read them during your 365 days program where you are going to take notes on your successes and reasons to be grateful in life. Look further down and the perks on the right side for more details and clarity.

       

      If you want a personalized book...

      Here is How we customize your book with the help of Create Space (Amazon).

      1. Choose one of the customized book perk like the Easy option with your own picture on the front cover and author name for only 15€ or the Complete option with changes on the outside and inside for 150€. Check with our support for more info.
      2. On the check out, write where you want to receive the book. Keep in mind that to edit, create and produce your book can take up to 7 working days. The shipping can take up to 30 days depending on your location,
      3. Make sure you give everything you want to have for your own book so the Mondosol staff can help you to get what you want with your book.

      If you want your book this Christmas order before 15th of December 2015 and ask for shipping cost.

      If you want to help others and feel awesome...

      1. Choose one of the "Help Others" perk like the "Buy 1, 3, 5 books and Give 1, 3, 5 books" to others. Or you can Buy "The Hero of your Community" where you offer 30 copies to your favorite charity. Or you can "Buy 1000" copies and give them to one Homeless Center to help the homeless. Check with our  support team for more info.
      2. On the check out write where you want to receive the book. Keep in mind that to edit, create and produce your book can take up to 7 working days. The shipping can take up to 30 days depending on your location.
      3. Make sure you give everything you want to have for your own book so the Mondosol staff can help you to get what you want with your book.

       

      WHERE YOUR MONEY GO?

      Every euro that you pledge will go towards supporting the IMAGINE YOUR DREAM project to ensure it is as successful and impactful as possible. Here’s how your money will and won’t be used.

      "1 000 000 euros to pay for:
      • Book to production (600 000 euros at least for 100 000 units) Each copy of the book sold, finances the writing, designing and printing.
      • Fill the orders (up to 40 000 packaging and shipping) Every copy sold of the paper book version is sent to your address or to your favourite Homeless Center/Charity/School/Library.
      • Cover the cost of the other perks, royalties and customization (150 000 euros) This will create a remarkable educational foundation available to everyone and one that can grow and evolve long past the conclusion of the campaign. 
      • Press and publicity (up to 10 000 euros) The success of this book depend on your contribution that will help to create a word of mouth to be successful, including infrastructure, events, development resources, and more. 
      • 10% donation to charities and referrals (up to 200 000 euros) We want to ensure the book created for Homeless Center/Charity/School/Library gets as much testing as possible with more kids in more towns and villages.
       
       

      If anything left will be spent:

      • on a Website and Mobile App (estimated cost 5000 euros) Your contribution will be an investment in open education, as well as ensuring that the technology can live and grow when the project concludes.
      • in the book translation in other languages (around 1000 euros per language) We are growing a global community to solve the grand challenges of our time. Your contribution will help create this community - come and join us!

       

       

      Importantly, your money will NOT be used in the following areas:

      • Mondosol staff salaries and offices.
      • Fundraising activities and events.

      If you have any further questions or queries about how the money is spent, feel free to share your questions on http://mondosol.zendesk.com

       

      WHAT'S YOUR PURPOSE?

       

      You are Important as our best partner, friend, customer and great supporter of the @ImagineYourDream  campaign • You have greatness within you and a big purpose in life. You know that you should never be too comfortable and that your dream is possible and necessary in life.

       

       

      CREATE YOUR OWN REALITY

      Although we can’t ignore money, you’d be surprised how little it matters. Explore the paths towards unending happiness – no matter what the state of the economy. Identify a great list of goals, the right goals that makes your life happy and original.

      CHASE YOUR PASSION

      "...Every single thing that is around us, that we call life has been created by people that are not smarter than you..."
      - Steve Jobs
       

       

      It's your right to have your dream come true with your personal agenda. Every time you fail you are a step closer to achieve your dreams, so start with buying this agenda IMAGINE YOUR DREAM and get what you want in life. 

       
       

      FROM IDEA TO REALITY

       

      Contributors of this campaign sponsor this passionate idea to help people like YOU reaching YOUR goals with YOUR OWN book "IMAGINE YOUR DREAM". Everyone have dreams so get this book, leave a comment and live your dreams. 

      Our idea with this campaign, is to reach 100 000 people who have no hope in life and deserve to imagine and live their dreams.

       


       

      Linn Mondello-Wenstad is the founder and Travel Manager @Mondosol • Studied at @University of Brighton • Love to help people like you to learn, improve life and travel with enriching experience.

      Elio Mondello Anza' is the CEO dreamer, Marketing Award Winner and Start up Founder @Mondosol, @Mondelio • Studied at @University of Milan, @Iep Grenoble • Love to Dream Big and Help others to Do the Same in their life.

       
       

       

       

      PROJECT TIMELINE

      • November 2015: Campaign launch
      • December 2015: Honoring PDF, eBook and paper book copies for Christmas
      • January 2016: Honoring Paper book copies with printing and shipping
      • February 2016: Honoring remaining copies printing and shipping
      • March 2016: Honoring first helping others perks, finding sponsors and charity organizations.
      • April 2016: Honoring remaining help others perks, stretching our 10% donation goal of this campaign
      • June 2016: Honoring remaining Dream perks, finding also sponsors locally where the donors live. 
       

       

      THE IMPACT

      • The project is important to achieve goals for people like you who want to be happy, have a life of satisfaction and contribution in their community. 
      • With this idea of writing a manifesto, a plan of action 100 000 people can imagine to live their dreams!
      • It is crazy for many people to think that it's possible to live their dreams and  walk toward the hard way to success, happiness and love.
       

      RISK & CHALLENGES

      Let us be very transparent and open. Here are the risks and obstacles we may face on the way to achieving our goal. We have tried to minimize all possible risks before launching the campaign, but we are aware that unanticipated issues can arise. Regardless, we'll always be 100% transparent with you.
       
      • Shipping date - Production time can vary depending on the volume of the print run, but we've left room for error in case our estimates are not accurate.
      • Product changes - The look of the book (binding, cover design, etc) will likely change throughout its development, especially after considering your feedback. But it will always be for the better :)
      • Working with external partners - Since we'll be coordinating with various partners to fulfill book orders, we ask for your understanding if unexpected challenges arise that affect our ability to respond as quickly as we would like to all your requests.
       
       

       

      WAYS YOU CAN HELP

      Ok so we know that some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help. Whether you donate to our campaign or not, you can still help make history. 

      • Hey folks, please get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.  Surely you know someone that needs Imagine Your Dream. Sharing is caring - Share The Imagine Your Dream Agenda with your friends and family! Spread on Facebook or Twitter the word about the #Imagineyourdream
      • Remember to use the Indiegogo share tools!
      • Stay connected. Follow Mondosol.com on Facebook and on Twitter to stay up-to-date on the Create Your Book.

       

      And that's all there is to it.

       
       

      NO EXCUSES


       

      Recognizing your generosity. Thank you!

       

      The work we do touches people's’ lives in a meaningful way for ever. All the help you give will touch a person, who will learn about your support and how big is your love. We thank you, and so do everyone else.

       

       

      Frequently Asked Questions

      Is this campaign international?

      Yes! If you see on top of the campaign you can use the language-selector to choose a different language.

      Can I donate from outside the USA?

      Oui, Ja, Absolutely! Indiegogo accepts international credit cards and PayPal, so you can make a contribution using your credit or debit card. 

      What payment methods do you accept?

      Indiegogo accepts all major credit cards and PayPal.

      Is shipping included?

      Yes for the paper book and there is no shipping in the electronic book or coupon because you will get it online. If you want the book with fast shipping please ask for the additional cost.

      I have more questions. Who do I ask?

       

      Please visit http://mondosol.zendesk.com to ask your question. We’ll get back to you as soon as we can.


      ========================================================
       

       

       

      Italiano.
       

      Qual'è il Tuo Sogno?

       

      Inizia a Realizzare il Tuo Sogno

      Immagina il tuo sogno, scrivilo, leggilo, guardalo, ascoltalo e aspettati che accada. Nessuna confusione, nessun processo costoso e difficile, senza perdere la tua fede e motivazione.

      Siamo entusiasti di presentare la nostra nuova invenzione che ti aiuterà a raggiungere il tuo sogno con la tua agenda personale. Ti aiuterà a fare esercizi ogni giorno per realizzare il tuo sogno.

      "Un sogno è solo un sogno. Un obiettivo è un sogno con un piano e una scadenza." — Harvey Mackay

      Aiuterà te stesso e aiuterà gli altri. Unitevi a noi in questa campagna che cambia la vita. PERCHE' NO?

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

      INDICE

      CREA LA TUA REALTÀ PERSONALE
