      NO SCUSE

       

      CREA LA TUA REALTÀ PERSONALE

       

      INSEGUI LA TUA PASSIONE

      "Ogni singola cosa che ci è intorno, che chiamiamo vita, è stata creata da persone che non sono più intelligenti di te."
      - Steve Jobs
       

      E' il tuo diritto vedere il tuo sogno realizzarsi con la tua agenda personale. Ogni volta che hai fallisci sei un passo più vicino a realizzare i tuoi sogni e così inizia con l'acquisto di questa agenda IMMAGINA IL TUO SOGNO & ottieni quello che vuoi nella vita.

      Guadagna fino a € 1000 per tutti quelli che inviti

      Ogni persona che ci mandi ti può far guadagnare il 10% del valore della donazione o un libro gratis ogni dieci copie. Guarda sotto il video principale per condividere e copiare il tuo unico link (URL).

       

      Copia il tuo link (=URL o indirizzo internet a questa campagna) personale per pubblicarlo su Internet e salvarlo per usarlo dopo con i tuoi conoscenti facendo clic sull'icona del collegamento cerchiato in basso. Leggi per maggiori informazioni

       

      COSA DICONO GLI ALTRI DI MONDOSOL?

      I collaboratori di questa campagna finanziano l'idea appassionata di aiutare le persone come TE nel raggiungimento dei TUOI obiettivi con il libro IMMAGINA IL TUO SOGNO. Tutti hanno dei sogni quindi prendi questo libro e vivi i tuoi sogni.
       



       

      Linn Mondello-Wenstad è il fondatore Cool e Travel Manager @Mondosol • Studiato alla @University of Brighton • Ama aiutare le persone come te a imparare, migliorare la vita e viaggiare con esperienze che arricchiscono.

      Elio Mondello Anza' è il CEO sognatore, vincitore del Premio Marketing e Fondatore della Start up @Mondosol, @Mondelio • Studiato alla @University of Milan, @Iep Grenoble • Ama sognare in grande e aiutare gli altri a fare lo stesso nella loro vita.

      A CHI SERVE?

      E' per le persone come te, che non riescono a raggiungere gli obiettivi nella vita e  stanno vivendo il sogno di un altro. E' per gente come te che crede davvero che il proprio sogno è possibile e necessario ed è disposto a fare qualunque cosa per realizzarlo.

       



      Se pensi che:
      • "questo è solo merda, io non ci credo"
      • "questo non è per me"
      • "questo è troppo difficile"
      • "questo non funzionerà mai"
      • "ho provato molte altre cose prima e non hanno funzionato"
      • "perché questa volta questa cosa dovrebbe funzionare"
      • bene...

      Provalo

       

       

      QUAL'È IL TUO SCOPO?

       

      Tu sei importante come il nostro miglior partner, amico, cliente e grande sostenitore della campagna @ImagineYourDream  • Sei grande con un importante scopo nella vita sapendo che non puoi essere troppo comodo e che il tuo sogno è possibile e necessario nella vita.
       

       

      PERCHE' HAI BISOGNO DELL'AGENDA?

       

      Sappiamo tutti che la gente come te ha bisogno di uno strumento per realizzare il proprio SOGNO e qualcosa che lo motiva a prendere delle azioni ogni giorno, perché NON IMPORTA QUANTO SIA BRUTTA LA TUA VITA O POSSA PEGGIORARE. TU C'E' L'HA FARAI.


      Sappiamo tutti che avere indicazioni nella vita è fondamentale, quindi con questa agenda puoi ottenere quello che vuoi nella vita. È necessario impostare alcuni obiettivi, scadenze e il piano per raggiungerli con questa agenda perché PUOI IMMAGINARE E VIVERE IL TUO SOGNO.
       

      COME FUNZIONA?

      Per apprezzare come funziona l'agenda "Immagina il tuo sogno" è importante capire la dinamica d'impostazione degli obiettivi, la pianificazione e le affermazioni positive. Raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi dipenderà da quanto duramente lavori per migliorarti.


      La cosa più facile nella tua vita è quella di raggiungere uno dei tuoi obiettivi e la cosa più difficile è credere che ti possa accadere.
       


      In questa agenda scrivi il tuo nome, i tuoi obiettivi e il piano per raggiungerli ed ogni giorno per 365 giorni potrai leggerli ad alta voce e scrivere perché hai successo e sei grato nella vita. Se ci credi lo puoi vedere.
       


      In questa campagna aiuti te stesso e millioni di persone ad ottenere i propri goal personali ed economici. In aggiunta, aiuti i componenti di Mondosol a sviluppare questo programma e a raggiungere ancora più persone a livello internazionale.
       

       

      E quando si tratta di creare un libro con me come autore, come è che fatto?

      Una volta che hai scelto uno dei perk (=premi) a disposizione per creare la propria agenda si lavorerà insieme con il felice personale di Mondosol per ottenere il tuo libro personalizzato. E si può avere la copertina anteriore e posteriore personalizzata, il tuo nome come autore nella copertina e nei ringraziamenti. Se si vuole si può anche avere una dedica personale e la lode con l'aggiunta di alcune foto all'interno.
       

       

       

      Ricevono tutti lo stesso libro, con leggerissime modifiche, oltre il nome dell'autore?

      Certo che no, questo libro è stato creato per essere un'agenda personale o diario in modo da poter personalizzare tutto l'esterno e parte dell'interno del libro come ti piace. Inoltre è necessario scrivere il manifesto personale e piano per realizzare il tuo sogno. E li leggerai durante il programma di 365 giorni in cui andrai a prendere appunti sui tuoi successi e le ragioni per essere grato nella vita. Verifica qua sotto e sulla destra per maggiori dettagli e chiarezza.

       

      CHE COSA OTTIENI CHE FUNZIONA DAVVERO!

       

      In aggiunta ad offrire il nostro amore eterno (non scherzo!), abbiamo preparato benefici accessori molto fighi per ringraziarti per il tuo generoso contributo. Inoltre, i nomi di tutti i nostri sostenitori appariranno nella pagina dei ringraziamenti del nostro libro, figo?



      Come si può vedere sulla destra puoi decidere tra semplici premi da 1 a 100 copie del libro, che può essere totalmente personalizzato da voi e Mondosol con testi e immagini. In aggiunta ottieni buoni per la tua vacanza da sogno, auto, casa.

       



      Scegli quale libro desideri prenotare sul lato destro e controlla all'interno del libro Kindle per vedere il contenuto dell'agenda Edizione Standard.

       

       

       

       

      Se vuoi un libro personalizzato...

       

      Ecco come personalizziamo il tuo libro con l'aiuto di Create Space (Amazon).

      1. Scegli una delle personalizzazioni del libro come quella Semplice con la propria immagine sulla copertina e il nome dell'autore per soli 15 € o quella Completa con modifiche all'esterno e all'interno per 150 €. Controlla con il supporto per ulteriori informazioni.
      2. Durante il pagamento scrivi dove si desidera ricevere il libro e tieni a mente che per modificare, creare e produrre il tuo libro può richiedere fino a 7 giorni lavorativi e la spedizione può richiedere fino a 30 giorni a seconda dell'indirizzo.
      3. Assicurati di dare tutto ciò che desideri avere per il tuo libro in modo che il personale appassionato di Mondosol ti può aiutare a ottenere ciò che sogni con il tuo libro.

       

      Se vuoi il tuo libro per questo Natale ordina prima del 15 Dicembre 2015 e chiedici per il costo di spedizione

       

      Se desideri aiutare gli altri e sentirti benissimo...

      1. Scegli uno dei perk per "Aiutare gli Altri" come "Compra 1,3,5 libri e regala 1,3,5 libri" o compra "l'Eroe della Comunità" e regala 30 libri o "Compra 1000 dei tuoi libri" e aiuta i senzatetto. Verifica con il nostro team di supporto per ulteriori informazioni.
      2. Durante il pagamento scrivi dove si desidera ricevere il libro e tieni a mente che per modificare, creare e produrre il tuo libro può richiedere fino a 7 giorni lavorativi e la spedizione può richiedere fino a 30 giorni a seconda dell'indirizzo.
      3. Assicurati di dare tutto ciò che si desidera avere per il proprio libro in modo che il personale appassionato di Mondosol ti può aiutare a ottenere ciò che si desidera con il tuo libro e la tua vita.
       

      ... e molto di più deve ancora venire.

      Commenta cosa ne pensi dei vantaggi e suggerisci le tue idee.

       

      DALL'IDEA ALLA REALTA'

      La nostra idea di questa campagna, è di raggiungere 100 000 persone che non hanno speranza nella vita e meritano di immaginare e vivere i propri sogni.
       

      TIMELINE DEL PROGETTO

      • Novembre 2015: Campagna
      • Dicembre 2015: Onorare le consegne per il libro in PDF,  Kindle e le copie per il Natale del libro cartaceo
      • Gennaio 2016: Onorare le consegne per le altre copie del libro cartaceo con la stampa e spedizione
      • Febbraio 2016: Onorare stampa e spedizione delle rimanenti copie
      • Marzo 2016: Onorare i primi regali per aiutare gli altri, trovando sponsor e organizzazioni di carità.
      • Aprile 2016: Onorare i rimanenti regali per aiutare gli altri, estendendo il nostro obiettivo di donazione del 10% per questa campagna
      • Giugno 2016: Onorare i rimanenti regali da sogno, trovando anche gli sponsor a livello locale dove vivono i donatori.
       

       
       

       

      COME USIAMO IL TUO DENARO?

      Ogni copia del libro venduta finanzia la scrittura, stampa e spedizione al tuo indirizzo e la contribuzione in denaro e in libri per il tuo favorito Centro per Senza Tetti/Beneficienza/Scuola/Biblioteca.

      "1 000 000 di euro per:
      • portare il libro alla produzione (almeno 100 000 unità), 
      • gestire gli ordini (imballaggio e spedizione) 
      • coprire il costo degli altri vantaggi e personalizzazioni
      • press e pubblicità
      • 10% donazioni benefiche e commissioni"

      Se qualcosa rimane (ci attendiamo circa 10 000 €) sarà impiegato in marketing, in modo che possiamo rendere più persone consapevoli del nostro progetto e contribuire ancora di più con un sito web e Applicazione per cellulare (costo stimato 5000 euro).

       

      L'IMPATTO

      • Il progetto è importante per raggiungere gli obiettivi per gente come te che vogliono essere felici, avere una vita di soddisfazione e il contributo nella loro comunità.
      • Con questa idea di scrivere un manifesto, un piano d'azione, 100 000 persone possono immaginare di vivere i propri sogni!
      • È pazzesco per molte persone pensare che sia possibile vivere i propri sogni e camminare verso il difficile modo per il successo, felicità e l'amore

      RISCHI & SFIDE

       

       

      Cerchiamo di essere molto trasparentI e sinceri. Qui ci sono dei rischi ed ostacoli che possiamo incontrare sulla strada per raggiungere il nostro obiettivo. Abbiamo cercato di minimizzare ogni rischio possibile prima di lanciare la campagna, ma siamo consapevoli del fatto che i problemi imprevisti possono sorgere. Indipendentemente da ciò, saremo sempre al 100% trasparenti con te.
       
      • La data di Spedizione - Tempo di produzione può variare a seconda del volume di tiratura, ma abbiamo calcolato uno spazio per l'errore nel caso in cui le nostre stime non siano precise.
      • Modifiche del prodotto - L'aspetto del libro (rilegatura, disegno di copertina, ecc) probabilmente cambierà nel corso dello sviluppo, soprattutto dopo aver esaminato il tuo feedback. Ma sarà sempre in meglio :)
      • Lavorando con partner esterni - Dal momento che ci coordineremo con vari partner per soddisfare gli ordini del libro, chiediamo la vostra comprensione, se sfide impreviste dovessere sopravvenire che influenzano la nostra capacità di rispondere il più rapidamente come vorremmo a tutte le vostre richieste.

      Altri modi in cui puoi aiutare. Al di là dei soldi - abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto nel diffondere il passaparola.

       

      Lo sappiamo che alcune persone non possono contribuire, ma questo non significa che non possono aiutare. Sia che doni alla nostra campagna o no, ti è ancora possibile contribuire a fare la storia.

       

      I MODI IN CUI PUOI AIUTARE:

      • Si prega di spargere la parola e fare un po di rumore sulla nostra campagna. Sicuramente conosci qualcuno che ha bisogno di Immaginare un Sogno. Sharing is Caring - Condividi L'agenda Immagine il Tuo Sogno con i tuoi amici e familiari! Diffondi su Facebook o  Twitter la parola con l'hastag #Immaginailtuosogno
      • Ricordati di utilizzare gli strumenti di condivisione Indiegogo!
      • Rimani connesso. Segui Mondosol su Facebook e Twitter per rimanere sempre aggiornato sulla campagna "Immagina il tuo sogno".

      E questo è tutto ciò che devi fare.

      NO SCUSE


       

      Riconosciamo la tua generosità. Grazie!

      Il lavoro che facciamo tocca la vita delle persone in modo significativo per sempre. Tutto l'aiuto che dai toccherà una persona, che avrà modo di conoscere il tuo sostegno e quanto è grande il tuo amore. Ti ringraziamo, e così fanno tutti gli altri.

      Domande frequenti

      È questa una campagna internazionale?

      Sì! Se si vede in cima alla campagna è possibile utilizzare il selettore della lingua per scegliere una lingua diversa.

      Posso donare al di fuori degli Stati Uniti?

      Certo che si, Oui, Ja, assolutamente! Indiegogo accetta carte di credito internazionali e PayPal, in modo da poter dare un contributo con la vostra carta di  debito o credito.

      Quali metodi di pagamento accettate?

      Indiegogo accetta tutte le principali carte di debito o credito e PayPal.

      Il trasporto è incluso?

      Sì per il libro di carta ci sono delle spese di trasporto incluse mentre nel libro elettronico ed i coupon non ci sono spese di trasporto perché si ottengono online. In caso vuoi una spedizione veloce contattaci per sapere il costo addizionale.

GO TO NEW CAMPAIGN Clicca qui per Italiano!I am sure you know that only few people in the world achieve their dreams and all the others are working for them so You have to start say Yes to your Life. I encourage you to change that and before you die don't leave dreams behind. What's Your Dream?

Start Achieving Your Dream

Imagine your dream, write it down, read it, watch it, listen to it and expect it to happen. No confusion, no expensive and difficult process without loosing your faith and motivation.
Introducing our new invention that will help you reach your dream with a personal agenda. It will help you do exercises on a daily basis to achieve your dream. Join us in this life changing campaign. 

"A dream is just a dream. A goal is a dream with a plan and a deadline." — Harvey Mackay

Others are talking about us and we would love to talk about you   
WHO IS THIS FOR?
 

Remember those dreams you had when you were a kid? As children we played many imaginative games. We became explorers, astronauts, emulated our favorite sports champions, movie stars and storybook idols.  What do you dream?

 
Do you want the best for your family? Do you aspire to become a community leader and role model? Do you dream of dong what you want when you want? Do you have a secret wish to accomplish? Do you live the fantasies you could only dream of?

If you thing that:


"it will never work for me" (You never developed a game plan to succeed.)
"it will take too much time" (You’re too busy answering other peoples’ orders.)
"this is too difficult, I don’t have the discipline to carry it out? (You don’t need the discipline! That’s where we come in!)"
"it would take a lot of work? (It requires no more effort than it takes to complete a popular magazine’s personality test!) 
"I am too busy to take advantage of it" (It takes no more time than going to the movie theatre or a sporting event once a year!) 
"it would cost too much? (You’re probably already paying for it!)
well... We don't just want you to back the campaign though, we want you to join our community and be a part of making history.


It's for people like you, that is not achieving goals in life and that is living someone else dream. It's for people like you who truly believe that your dream is possible and necessary and willing to do whatever it takes to achieve it.
The most famous behavioral scientists have discovered people’s aversion to loss usually trumps the potential for reward. The joy of accomplishment motivates you towards achieving your Dream but powerful demotivators keep you stuck. 
Give it a Try
 
 
 
WHAT YOU GET?We’ve put together an exciting set of perks around the mission of helping people imagining their dream and achieving their goals in life. 
 
 
€1: BUY 1 PDF BOOK + HELP OTHERS
 
 

Show your support and get the following:


1 Book Copy in PDF - your name will be added in the book acknowledgments. The book is fully customizable with your notes in Acrobat.

Donation - your name will be sent to the charity organization and we will donate 100% of the PROFIT to help people with no hope.

Digital Celebration - we will send you a digital thank you message in all social media that you can use to show your support for the campaign.

 
 
€15: EASY PERSONALISED BOOK + COUPON
Hurry up to get the following:


1 Paper Book Copy - with 30% dicount on the normal price and more than 50% on retail price. On top your name will be added in the book acknowledgments. The book is fully customizable with your notes.

Donation - your name will be sent to the charity organization and we will donate 100% of the PROFIT to help people with no hope.

Digital Celebration - we will send you a digital thank you message in all social media that you can use to show your support for the campaign.


 
In addition to this, you will get a coupon to book the accomodations managed by Mondosol.
 
In our site www.mondosol.com you can book one of our accommodations getting back the money you spent for no more than 5% of the total spend and experience a holiday dream of your life. Check the instructions under here and inside the book. 
Get access to this revolutionary educational book so you can personalize it on your own and test it to achieve your goals in your life.
This will get your hands on a book that could have a profound global impact, months before anyone else gets to use it.
It doesn't stop there...you will also get:
 


Extended Digital Content - as part of the crowdfunding campaign we will be releasing special digital content including material from celebrities such as Les Brown, Sir. Richard Branson, Eric Thomas, Tony Robbins, and more!

Make your book on Amazon - get a chance to publish your book on Amazon so your friends and family can buy a copy and you can become a famous author!

Credit in the book - your name will be added to the acknowledgments section as a credit.

 


Check inside the Kindle book to see the content of the Agenda Standard Edition.

Our generous invention will help you reach your dream with a personal agenda. It will give you the exercises to do on a daily basis to achieve your dream with a step-by-step process that can be used to master anything.
This perk includes the previous details of the EARLY BIRD print copy of the book at the regular price, without shipping and 10% profit donation to charities of the total amout raised by the campaign.

In addition to this, you will also get a Personalisation of your own book in limited edition with your name as author and in the acknowledgments, your picture on the front cover. If you are looking for the same service it costs $199.
 
You will also get live video streaming access to Imagine Your Dream event where you can watch and learn how to use the agenda, discuss and debate with the team any of your ideas. This, combined with your change to publish it in Amazon provides a wonderful opportunity to influence how the future "Imagine Your Dream" book will look like.
 
In addition to this perk cost you will pay  extra for the shipping.
 
 
 
€17: BUY 1 GIVE 1 BOOK + COUPON

2 Paper Book Copies with 15% OFF
Donation of 10%

Make Your Book in Amazon

WHY DO YOU NEED IT?   We all know that people like you need a tool to help you accomplish your DREAM and something to motivate you to take action every single day, because NO MATTER HOW BAD IT IS OR HOW BAD IT GETS YOU ARE GOING TO MAKE IT.We all know that having directions in life is crucial, so with this agenda you can get what you want in life. You need to set some goals, deadline and plan to achieve them with this agenda because YOU CAN IMAGINE AND LIVE YOUR DREAM.
 HOW DOES IT WORK?In order to appreciate how the "Imagine Your Dream" agenda works, it's important you understand the dynamic of goal settings, planning and positive affirmation. Achieving your goals depends on how hard you are working to improve.The easiest thing in your life is to achieve one of your goals and the most difficult thing is to believe that it can happen to you. 
In this agenda you write your name, your goals and plan to achieve them. Everyday for 365 days you will read them loud and write why you are successful and grateful in life. If you believe it you can see it. 
In this campaign you help yourself and millions of people to achieve personal and economic goals in life. On top, you help the members of Mondosol to develop this program and the startup company reaching even more people internationally.  
And when it comes to creating a book with me as an author, how is that done? Once you have picked one of the perk available to create your own agenda you will work together with the happy staff of Mondosol to get your book done. And you can have your front and back cover personalized, your name as an author on the cover and in the acknowledgements. If you want, you can also have a personal dedication and praise adding some pictures inside.   
Does everyone get the same book with very minor changes besides the author's name? Of course not, this book is created to be a personal agenda or diary so we can personalize all the outside and part of the inside of the book as you like. Also you need to write your personal manifesto and plan to achieve your dream. And you will read them during your 365 days program where you are going to take notes on your successes and reasons to be grateful in life. Look further down and the perks on the right side for more details and clarity. 
If you want a personalized book...

Here is How we customize your book with the help of Create Space (Amazon).

Choose one of the customized book perk like the Easy option with your own picture on the front cover and author name for only 15€ or the Complete option with changes on the outside and inside for 150€. Check with our support for more info.
On the check out, write where you want to receive the book. Keep in mind that to edit, create and produce your book can take up to 7 working days. The shipping can take up to 30 days depending on your location,
Make sure you give everything you want to have for your own book so the Mondosol staff can help you to get what you want with your book.

If you want your book this Christmas order before 15th of December 2015 and ask for shipping cost.

If you want to help others and feel awesome...

Choose one of the "Help Others" perk like the "Buy 1, 3, 5 books and Give 1, 3, 5 books" to others. Or you can Buy "The Hero of your Community" where you offer 30 copies to your favorite charity. Or you can "Buy 1000" copies and give them to one Homeless Center to help the homeless. Check with our  support team for more info.
On the check out write where you want to receive the book. Keep in mind that to edit, create and produce your book can take up to 7 working days. The shipping can take up to 30 days depending on your location.

WHERE YOUR MONEY GO?

Every euro that you pledge will go towards supporting the IMAGINE YOUR DREAM project to ensure it is as successful and impactful as possible. Here’s how your money will and won’t be used.
"1 000 000 euros to pay for:

Book to production (600 000 euros at least for 100 000 units) Each copy of the book sold, finances the writing, designing and printing.
Fill the orders (up to 40 000 packaging and shipping) Every copy sold of the paper book version is sent to your address or to your favourite Homeless Center/Charity/School/Library.
Cover the cost of the other perks, royalties and customization (150 000 euros) This will create a remarkable educational foundation available to everyone and one that can grow and evolve long past the conclusion of the campaign. 
Press and publicity (up to 10 000 euros) The success of this book depend on your contribution that will help to create a word of mouth to be successful, including infrastructure, events, development resources, and more. 
10% donation to charities and referrals (up to 200 000 euros) We want to ensure the book created for Homeless Center/Charity/School/Library gets as much testing as possible with more kids in more towns and villages.

 
 If anything left will be spent:

on a Website and Mobile App (estimated cost 5000 euros) Your contribution will be an investment in open education, as well as ensuring that the technology can live and grow when the project concludes.
in the book translation in other languages (around 1000 euros per language) We are growing a global community to solve the grand challenges of our time. Your contribution will help create this community - come and join us!

 
 
Importantly, your money will NOT be used in the following areas:

Mondosol staff salaries and offices.
Fundraising activities and events.

If you have any further questions or queries about how the money is spent, feel free to share your questions on http://mondosol.zendesk.com WHAT'S YOUR PURPOSE?

RISK & CHALLENGES
Let us be very transparent and open. Here are the risks and obstacles we may face on the way to achieving our goal. We have tried to minimize all possible risks before launching the campaign, but we are aware that unanticipated issues can arise. Regardless, we'll always be 100% transparent with you. 
Shipping date - Production time can vary depending on the volume of the print run, but we've left room for error in case our estimates are not accurate.
Product changes - The look of the book (binding, cover design, etc) will likely change throughout its development, especially after considering your feedback. But it will always be for the better :)
Working with external partners - Since we'll be coordinating with various partners to fulfill book orders, we ask for your understanding if unexpected challenges arise that affect our ability to respond as quickly as we would like to all your requests.

CREA LA TUA REALTÀ PERSONALE

COSA DICONO GLI ALTRI DI MONDOSOL?
 I collaboratori di questa campagna finanziano l'idea appassionata di aiutare le persone come TE nel raggiungimento dei TUOI obiettivi con il libro IMMAGINA IL TUO SOGNO. Tutti hanno dei sogni quindi prendi questo libro e vivi i tuoi sogni. 
 Linn Mondello-Wenstad è il fondatore Cool e Travel Manager @Mondosol • Studiato alla @University of Brighton • Ama aiutare le persone come te a imparare, migliorare la vita e viaggiare con esperienze che arricchiscono.
Elio Mondello Anza' è il CEO sognatore, vincitore del Premio Marketing e Fondatore della Start up @Mondosol, @Mondelio • Studiato alla @University of Milan, @Iep Grenoble • Ama sognare in grande e aiutare gli altri a fare lo stesso nella loro vita.
A CHI SERVE?
 E' per le persone come te, che non riescono a raggiungere gli obiettivi nella vita e  stanno vivendo il sogno di un altro. E' per gente come te che crede davvero che il proprio sogno è possibile e necessario ed è disposto a fare qualunque cosa per realizzarlo. 
Se pensi che:
"questo è solo merda, io non ci credo"
"questo non è per me"
"questo è troppo difficile"
"questo non funzionerà mai"
"ho provato molte altre cose prima e non hanno funzionato"
"perché questa volta questa cosa dovrebbe funzionare"
bene...

Provalo
 
 
QUAL'È IL TUO SCOPO?
  Tu sei importante come il nostro miglior partner, amico, cliente e grande sostenitore della campagna @ImagineYourDream  • Sei grande con un importante scopo nella vita sapendo che non puoi essere troppo comodo e che il tuo sogno è possibile e necessario nella vita.  
PERCHE' HAI BISOGNO DELL'AGENDA?   Sappiamo tutti che la gente come te ha bisogno di uno strumento per realizzare il proprio SOGNO e qualcosa che lo motiva a prendere delle azioni ogni giorno, perché NON IMPORTA QUANTO SIA BRUTTA LA TUA VITA O POSSA PEGGIORARE. TU C'E' L'HA FARAI.Sappiamo tutti che avere indicazioni nella vita è fondamentale, quindi con questa agenda puoi ottenere quello che vuoi nella vita. È necessario impostare alcuni obiettivi, scadenze e il piano per raggiungerli con questa agenda perché PUOI IMMAGINARE E VIVERE IL TUO SOGNO. COME FUNZIONA? Per apprezzare come funziona l'agenda "Immagina il tuo sogno" è importante capire la dinamica d'impostazione degli obiettivi, la pianificazione e le affermazioni positive. Raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi dipenderà da quanto duramente lavori per migliorarti.La cosa più facile nella tua vita è quella di raggiungere uno dei tuoi obiettivi e la cosa più difficile è credere che ti possa accadere. 
In questa agenda scrivi il tuo nome, i tuoi obiettivi e il piano per raggiungerli ed ogni giorno per 365 giorni potrai leggerli ad alta voce e scrivere perché hai successo e sei grato nella vita. Se ci credi lo puoi vedere. 
In questa campagna aiuti te stesso e millioni di persone ad ottenere i propri goal personali ed economici. In aggiunta, aiuti i componenti di Mondosol a sviluppare questo programma e a raggiungere ancora più persone a livello internazionale.  
E quando si tratta di creare un libro con me come autore, come è che fatto? Una volta che hai scelto uno dei perk (=premi) a disposizione per creare la propria agenda si lavorerà insieme con il felice personale di Mondosol per ottenere il tuo libro personalizzato. E si può avere la copertina anteriore e posteriore personalizzata, il tuo nome come autore nella copertina e nei ringraziamenti. Se si vuole si può anche avere una dedica personale e la lode con l'aggiunta di alcune foto all'interno.   
Ricevono tutti lo stesso libro, con leggerissime modifiche, oltre il nome dell'autore? Certo che no, questo libro è stato creato per essere un'agenda personale o diario in modo da poter personalizzare tutto l'esterno e parte dell'interno del libro come ti piace. Inoltre è necessario scrivere il manifesto personale e piano per realizzare il tuo sogno. E li leggerai durante il programma di 365 giorni in cui andrai a prendere appunti sui tuoi successi e le ragioni per essere grato nella vita. Verifica qua sotto e sulla destra per maggiori dettagli e chiarezza. 
CHE COSA OTTIENI CHE FUNZIONA DAVVERO!
  In aggiunta ad offrire il nostro amore eterno (non scherzo!), abbiamo preparato benefici accessori molto fighi per ringraziarti per il tuo generoso contributo. Inoltre, i nomi di tutti i nostri sostenitori appariranno nella pagina dei ringraziamenti del nostro libro, figo?Come si può vedere sulla destra puoi decidere tra semplici premi da 1 a 100 copie del libro, che può essere totalmente personalizzato da voi e Mondosol con testi e immagini. In aggiunta ottieni buoni per la tua vacanza da sogno, auto, casa. 
Scegli quale libro desideri prenotare sul lato destro e controlla all'interno del libro Kindle per vedere il contenuto dell'agenda Edizione Standard.

DALL'IDEA ALLA REALTA' La nostra idea di questa campagna, è di raggiungere 100 000 persone che non hanno speranza nella vita e meritano di immaginare e vivere i propri sogni. TIMELINE DEL PROGETTO

Novembre 2015: Campagna
Dicembre 2015: Onorare le consegne per il libro in PDF,  Kindle e le copie per il Natale del libro cartaceo
Gennaio 2016: Onorare le consegne per le altre copie del libro cartaceo con la stampa e spedizione
Febbraio 2016: Onorare stampa e spedizione delle rimanenti copie
Marzo 2016: Onorare i primi regali per aiutare gli altri, trovando sponsor e organizzazioni di carità.
Aprile 2016: Onorare i rimanenti regali per aiutare gli altri, estendendo il nostro obiettivo di donazione del 10% per questa campagna
Giugno 2016: Onorare i rimanenti regali da sogno, trovando anche gli sponsor a livello locale dove vivono i donatori.
   
 
COME USIAMO IL TUO DENARO?
Ogni copia del libro venduta finanzia la scrittura, stampa e spedizione al tuo indirizzo e la contribuzione in denaro e in libri per il tuo favorito Centro per Senza Tetti/Beneficienza/Scuola/Biblioteca."1 000 000 di euro per:


portare il libro alla produzione (almeno 100 000 unità), 
gestire gli ordini (imballaggio e spedizione) 
coprire il costo degli altri vantaggi e personalizzazioni
press e pubblicità
10% donazioni benefiche e commissioni"

Se qualcosa rimane (ci attendiamo circa 10 000 €) sarà impiegato in marketing, in modo che possiamo rendere più persone consapevoli del nostro progetto e contribuire ancora di più con un sito web e Applicazione per cellulare (costo stimato 5000 euro). L'IMPATTO



Il progetto è importante per raggiungere gli obiettivi per gente come te che vogliono essere felici, avere una vita di soddisfazione e il contributo nella loro comunità.

Con questa idea di scrivere un manifesto, un piano d'azione, 100 000 persone possono immaginare di vivere i propri sogni!

È pazzesco per molte persone pensare che sia possibile vivere i propri sogni e camminare verso il difficile modo per il successo, felicità e l'amore


RISCHI & SFIDE
 


  Cerchiamo di essere molto trasparentI e sinceri. Qui ci sono dei rischi ed ostacoli che possiamo incontrare sulla strada per raggiungere il nostro obiettivo. Abbiamo cercato di minimizzare ogni rischio possibile prima di lanciare la campagna, ma siamo consapevoli del fatto che i problemi imprevisti possono sorgere. Indipendentemente da ciò, saremo sempre al 100% trasparenti con te. 

La data di Spedizione - Tempo di produzione può variare a seconda del volume di tiratura, ma abbiamo calcolato uno spazio per l'errore nel caso in cui le nostre stime non siano precise.

Modifiche del prodotto - L'aspetto del libro (rilegatura, disegno di copertina, ecc) probabilmente cambierà nel corso dello sviluppo, soprattutto dopo aver esaminato il tuo feedback. Ma sarà sempre in meglio :)

Lavorando con partner esterni - Dal momento che ci coordineremo con vari partner per soddisfare gli ordini del libro, chiediamo la vostra comprensione, se sfide impreviste dovessere sopravvenire che influenzano la nostra capacità di rispondere il più rapidamente come vorremmo a tutte le vostre richieste.



Altri modi in cui puoi aiutare. Al di là dei soldi - abbiamo bisogno del tuo aiuto nel diffondere il passaparola.
 
Lo sappiamo che alcune persone non possono contribuire, ma questo non significa che non possono aiutare. Sia che doni alla nostra campagna o no, ti è ancora possibile contribuire a fare la storia.
 I MODI IN CUI PUOI AIUTARE:

Si prega di spargere la parola e fare un po di rumore sulla nostra campagna. Sicuramente conosci qualcuno che ha bisogno di Immaginare un Sogno. Sharing is Caring - Condividi L'agenda Immagine il Tuo Sogno con i tuoi amici e familiari! Diffondi su Facebook o  Twitter la parola con l'hastag #Immaginailtuosogno

Ricordati di utilizzare gli strumenti di condivisione Indiegogo!
Rimani connesso. Segui Mondosol su Facebook e Twitter per rimanere sempre aggiornato sulla campagna "Immagina il tuo sogno".

E questo è tutto ciò che devi fare.

NO SCUSE
 Riconosciamo la tua generosità. Grazie! Il lavoro che facciamo tocca la vita delle persone in modo significativo per sempre. Tutto l'aiuto che dai toccherà una persona, che avrà modo di conoscere il tuo sostegno e quanto è grande il tuo amore. Ti ringraziamo, e così fanno tutti gli altri.
Domande frequenti
È questa una campagna internazionale?
Sì! Se si vede in cima alla campagna è possibile utilizzare il selettore della lingua per scegliere una lingua diversa.
Posso donare al di fuori degli Stati Uniti?
Certo che si, Oui, Ja, assolutamente! Indiegogo accetta carte di credito internazionali e PayPal, in modo da poter dare un contributo con la vostra carta di  debito o credito.
Quali metodi di pagamento accettate?
Indiegogo accetta tutte le principali carte di debito o credito e PayPal.
Il trasporto è incluso?
Sì per il libro di carta ci sono delle spese di trasporto incluse mentre nel libro elettronico ed i coupon non ci sono spese di trasporto perché si ottengono online. In caso vuoi una spedizione veloce contattaci per sapere il costo addizionale. Ho

story:
Short Summary

I am Desmond Etsebeth, a videographer/ editor. I produce online videos, from corporate to music videos. (See my work at:  http://www.universoulmedia.co.za/

This campaign is about personalised nursery rhyme videos for children aged 2 to 5. What we aim to do is place (your) child in a video alongside the characters in a popular nursery rhyme for example, "Old MacDonald had a farm" and "Twinkle twinkle little star."

See example video here :


What We Need

The funds ($3750) will go to the singer/ vocal artist. We have the tools to create the video and produce the music. We would like to create 15 popular nursery rhymes as listed below. The artist charges $250 per song, times 15 nursery rhymes =  $3750.


What We Need

The funds ($3750) will go to the singer/ vocal artist. We have the tools to create the video and produce the music. We would like to create 15 popular nursery rhymes as listed below. The artist charges $250 per song, times 15 nursery rhymes =  $3750.

The Nursery Rhymes

1.  Old MacDonald had a farm
2.  Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
3.  Humpty Dumpty
4.  Itsy Bitsy Spider
5.  The Alphabet
6.  Hush Little baby
7.  The Hare and the Tortoise
8.  Three blind mice
9.  Old Mother Hubbard
10, One Two Buckle my Shoe
11. Little Miss Muffet
12. Baa Baa Black Sheep
13. Hickory Dickory Dock
14. Mary had a Little Lamb
15. This Little Piggy


The Impact

This campaign could be a career changer for me and I believe that it is an unique idea that has not been done before.

Risks & Challenges

There are always risks accompanying a new idea, but I believe that this campaign has a lot of potential. The challenge will be to convince potential backers to support this campaign.

Other Ways You Can Help

I would greatly appreciate if you could share the campaign far and wide! Even if you cannot contribute financially, word of mouth is a powerful thing and will allow this campaign to reach as many hands as possible. Thank you in advance for spreading the PERSONALISED NURSERY RHYME VIDEOS word.

story:
The Project

I've been working on a program to help improve the reading and listening skills of students who are learning foreign languages. The first group of several thousand students will consist of children in Thai orphanages, Burmese migrant workers in Bangkok and Burmese refugees in refugee camps along the Thai/Burmese border. Within a year, my goal is to provide these students and hundreds of thousands of others around the world in similar situations with an educational platform that helps them learn a foreign language and broadens the opportunities that are open to them.


The Inspiration


When I was teaching English to kids in the south of Thailand, I found it difficult to get them interested in reading English language stories. Because I enjoy creating stories almost as much as reading them, I decided to write some English stories for my students. To get them really involved in the stories, I used a format that put them into the story as the main character who had to make decisions that would lead to different outcomes. This proved to be a great way to get the kids more interested in reading. When they finished one arc of the story, they'd go back and find out what would have happened if they had made different decisions.

How It Has Evolved

The original idea was only to write stories that would make learning English a more enjoyable experience for Thai students. Then I looked back at my time spent trying to learn Spanish while living in Argentina. I had trouble finding reading materials that would help me learn Spanish, while also maintaining my interest.  Because of that experience, I thought it would be a good idea to make a reading program that could help people who are trying to learn foreign languages.

I came up with a format to write stories that were translated into multiple languages and allowed a speaker of any one of those languages to easily read stories in any of the other languages. Using the same program, a Thai speaker could learn English, an Arabic speaker could learn German, a Portuguese speaker could learn Vietnamese, and so on. A couple hundred language learners that I shared the idea with thought it was good enough to help out with translations. You can find a very basic version of how the program will work here:

Example Story

Notice how you can easily switch back and forth between the language you are learning and your native language without constantly consulting a dictionary? The stories will be translated into versions for beginner, intermediate and advanced learners. Other writers are coming on board, so the stories will improve. The user interface will also be an improvement over the current one.

Online Classes

I plan to develop online classes to be used along with the reading program. Although being taught a foreign language by a native speaker in a classroom is still the ideal learning situation, it's just not economically viable in many parts of the world. This feature will make it possible for students to attend online language classes even though they wouldn't normally have access to them.

What Good Will It Do?

Learning a foreign language will open up many educational and job opportunities for the program's participants. Although many of us often take a quality education for granted, this is not the case for most of the students who will take part in the initial program. For example, most of the Burmese migrant workers who will benefit from the program spend six days a week doing manual or domestic labor, then attend a learning center to study Thai and English on their one day off.

How You Can Help

There are several ways that you can help make this program available to those who need it most:

  • For as little as $5, you can have your contribution pooled together with other contributions. For every $100 raised, I'll add another school, single location non-profit learning center or library to the program.
  • Purchase the program to help you or someone you know who is learning a foreign language. All purchases of less than $100 will also be pooled together to fund reading programs. 
  • Purchase the program for use in the school, non-profit learning center or library of your choice. For just $100, every student in your child's school could use the program to help them learn a foreign language. If two people purchase the program for the same school, I'll let the school know that you both bought the program for the school and you can each choose one more school that gets to use the program.
  • Tell others about the project. Let them know about it by sharing a link to this campaign.
  • If you're interested in getting directly involved in the project, contact me because I could really use your help.

Delivery

Burmese, English, Mandarin Chinese, Spanish and Thai translations will be available in December.

Arabic, Brazilian Portuguese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Korean, Russian and Vietnamese translations will be available in January.

Online classes will begin in February.

story:
The National Center for Accessible Media at WGBH is seeking funding to begin development of CADET, caption authoring software which will enable anyone to easily and affordably produce high-quality caption files that are compatible with any media player on any web browser. 

The majority of online videos are self-generated, with original content that is not accessible to millions of people who are deaf or hard of hearing because the videos are not captioned. Automated speech-to-text captioning does not provide reliable access. Federal regulations and related litigation will continue to dramatically increase the number of online videos that are required to be captioned, with high-quality captions. This is especially true of online education/ MOOCs. Currently there is no simple, inexpensive caption-editing software for creating post-production online captions. 

NCAM’s solution is to create and distribute a FREE, high-quality, easy-to-use caption editor that will produce caption files that are compatible with all popular web browsers, online media players, and can be readily uploaded to social media sites. NCAM will build on the original success of its now out-of-date caption-editing tool, MAGpie (Media Access Generator), whose thousands of users proved that a simple and affordable tool can increase the number of captioned videos online.

NCAM is seeking contributions toward its goal of $50,000 to fund the beta version of CADET, the Caption And Description Editing Tool, in 2016. 

CADET will implement much of the functionality available only in high-end caption authoring workstations, such as WYSIWYG placement, timing assistance, multiple export formats covering the most used timed-text file types, keyboard shortcuts, and other such features. Unlike other captioning tools creators, NCAM has a unique insight into the needs of caption writers, due to WGBH’s long history in creating captions and developing captioning tools.  Since captioning requires human input, care was taken to make the process as easy as possible. For example, keyboard shortcuts enable a caption writer to save keystrokes and work without a mouse. CADET will have a specific visual layout that makes transcription and editing much easier. And, depending on the skill of the caption writer, CADET will make it possible for each of the four steps of captioning (transcription, editing, timing, and review) to be done separately (novice) or simultaneously (expert). Other captioning software is not optimized in these ways.

Our experience with MAGpie demonstrated that a free, high-quality tool will find widespread adoption by individuals or institutions, especially in education and government. Many video producers in education and in government are required to caption their videos, and many more commercial Web sites could begin captioning soon, due to the Department of Justice’s ongoing efforts to communicate the importance of Web accessibility as part of the Americans with Disabilities Act. The range of institutions in need of quality captioning software is evident from the number of requests NCAM receives for information about updates to MAGpie.

Additionally, it has been proven that captions are beneficial in literacy training and reading comprehension. Captions are helpful for non-native speakers, in situations where the volume cannot be turned on, and as a powerful tool for search. Providing a free, high-quality caption editor will make it easy for all content creators, from education to entertainment, to provide captions on all of their online videos. 

Technical Specifications of CADET:

•  Browser-based UI

•  Import existing projects, files (local only)

•  Import source files (text, timed-text, local only); also transcribe text into editor

•  Simple timing, placement, styling, WYSIWYG UX

•  Review captions within player/app

•  File export – text, text+TC, SAMI, SRT, WebVtt, TTML, TextML, QTtext, SCC, Spruce

NCAM is seeking contributions toward its goal of $50,000 to fund the beta development of CADET, the Caption And Description Editing Tool, in 2016. 

NCAM is seeking funds to begin development of a beta version of the software to share with donors and experts in the field for feedback.

We are simultaneously seeking funding from alternate sources: partners, major donors, etc. However, we're asking you to help.  It is simple: if we can't fund it, we can't do it. We think it is worth a try. If you do too, please contribute.

The costs associated with this R&D effort are:

·  Engineering and staff time

·  Office space, hardware, and related administrative expenses

Donations in any amount are welcome to support these efforts. All contributors, regardless of the amount, will have their names listed in a dedicated credits page within the software itself.

If you are able to contribute $100 or more, you will be sent a beta version of CADET for testing. Your early user-feedback will help our engineers make CADET as versatile and easy to use as possible.

Once completed, NCAM will release the CADET software to everyone, everywhere, free of charge. 

Your contribution, no matter how small, will help fund access to online videos for millions of people. 

If you are unable to help financially, please spread the word by reaching out to friends and family.  And be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools to get the message out.

All of us at NCAM thank you for helping us fulfill our mission to ensure that the 40 million Americans with limited or no access to media's sights and sounds will not be left out of the Information Age.

**************************************************************************************************** 

CADET:  Caption and Description Editing Tool Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)

This FAQ list is a work in progress and questions will be added as we receive inquiries.

****************************************************************************************************

Is CADET going to be a revenue-generating tool/product?

No. Like its predecessor, MAGpie, CADET will be provided to all users, everywhere, free of charge.  The money that we are trying to raise is specifically and solely for the research, software development, testing and dissemination needed to launch CADET.

Aren’t you just updating existing software?

While we are taking the lessons learned from, and expertise behind, various NCAM development efforts, we have to build this tool from the ground up to meet new browser and media player requirements, and to incorporate format requirements, that didn’t exist in 2000 when MAGpie was built.  As such, we can’t just “update” MAGpie.

We are seeking only to fund the actual costs of the senior staff time (internal/external developers and UI/UX experts) and related administrative expenses.  While we are housed within the WGBH Educational Foundation, NCAM is a wholly self-supported unit; we cover all related costs, such as office space/computer hardware and software/overhead & admin, etc.  Once built, we’ll then offer CADET to everyone for free.  

We are at the forefront of standards research and policy requirements and, combined with our caption creation and caption tech development expertise, we are uniquely qualified to build a free tool that will help users to create high-quality captions a SINGLE time for use across multiple browsers, media players, and for ready sharing to social media sites.  

You talk about captions, but can CADET also be used for description (Caption and DESCRIPTION Editing Tool)?

CADET will enable users to create text descriptions that can be delivered as a text track and read aloud by screen readers at time of delivery.

Will CADET be released as Open Source?

In a word, maybe. NCAM is a wholly self-supported unit, funded by a combination of research and consulting.  Because this project is so important to us (and, in our opinion, to the world), we want to move forward and build the tool.  Because of what we do, we want to make it excellent.  Because of who we are, we want to keep it free.  Therein lies the rub.  We can work to raise funds for initial development, testing, and dissemination.  We will not (in this scope) have funds to support the tool into the future unless we seek additional funds.  It is the same situation we found ourselves in with MAGpie.  

— Scenario One is that we don’t release the code, and that we allow users to support one another via a listserv (in which NCAM participates as possible).  This was the MAGpie model, and does not require a consequential investment of staff dollars or time to manage post-launch.

— Scenario Two is that we release the code, making it open source.  However, that plan is not without a need for management.  We’d need to make arrangements for (and provide staff time to) manage the code tree, track modifications, etc.  That is not insignificant, and is currently beyond the scope of our funding capabilities.  

We’d welcome your ideas and your input on these important decisions.

the MAGpie model, and does not require a consequential investment of staff
dollars or time to manage post-launch.
— Scenario
Two is that we release the code, making it open source.  However, that
plan is not without a need for management.  We’d need to make arrangements
for (and provide staff time to) manage the code tree, track modifications, etc.
 That is not insignificant, and is currently beyond the scope of our
funding capabilities.  
We’d
welcome your ideas and your input on these important decisions.

story:
We started our foundation, SkyVell Jewelry Foundation for the Lapidary Arts a little over two years ago. We have soley supported our foundation ourselves with the exception of two small gifts under $500. We are now in need of outside help for the following reasons.

 We initially had a store front where we met many enthusiastic people of all ages who we were teaching and recieved calls and emails from all over the country from those who had a desire to learn the art of cutting gemstones which is known as the art of lapidary, silversmithing, goldsmithing and jewelry design. Unfortunately we felt it was necessary to leave our location as we were feeling endangered by the element that was present and did not choose to risk our students safety or our own. 

 We purchased a humble RV and decided that we could better serve those who wanted to learn on their premesis from our mobile classroom. Some students were not able to travel due to certain disabilities and transportation issues.

We headed to Colorado in fact,from Wisconsin to teach students who had a desire to learn but did not have the ability to travel. Going through Kansas, we suffered a blown tire and three tornados that actually caused frame damage on the RV. We did make it to Colorado but the needed repairs made the RV eventually inoperable and we had to leave the mobile classroom there and return to Wisconsin. While we were able to teach a few out in Colorado we were forced to leave many potential students without the ability to start classes and many whom can only hope for our return someday soon.

We are asking for your donations so we can purchase a new Mobile RV Classroom and modify it so that some people who's mobility is limited due to disabilities do not have to give up on their dreams to learn to create custom designed jewelry. 

We know its a lot to ask for but if we can change even one life our mission is well worth it.  If you'll look at other schools and the debt you will incur and then look at our fee schedule you will find that we can take you from "The Mine to the Body" in about two weeks if you have the aptitude for approx. $2000 which is unheard of anywhere in the industry. Just imagine us being able to change lives for a fraction of the amount others charge. The students will learn all basic techniques in lapidary and silversmithing. They will be able to cut a free form cab and a calibrated cab their first day. All the way from rough lapidary rock. Then we focus on the silversmithing and jewelry design the rest of the class room time. We teach how to work sheet silver and to make bezels,seats and bails of all kinds to get their creative juices going. Then we teach them how to make findings by hand,beads and clasps all from sterling and fine silver. We teach them how to make rings from sheet silver and half round wire. Then we teach them how to make jewelry designs from necklaces to bracelets. And the last thing they learn will be to wire wrap anything they bring to us,like something they found out walking in the woods or a beautiful rock or fossil they may have found. And if they don't have an item we can provide one for them to learn.

Once they have all the basics then each student can decide if they would like to continue their classes ...which will be intermediate and advanced. Each level will last about two weeks and digs deeper into much harder techniques i.e. Wax working,lost wax casting and to learn to facet a gem stone.

  As of this moment we have already taught 350 people. Our youngest student was 9 1/2 yrs. old and a prodigy. She is just as adapt at silversmithing and jewelry design as any adult that we have taught. Our oldest was 73yrs. old and finally able to complete jewelry designs that he had only been able to dream about for decades.

We don't want anyone who has the desire to learn to have to wait decades to fulfill their dreams. We want to reach people all over the nation who wish to learn; generally 20 to 30 people will bring us to an area. We normally teach one to two students and sometimes a entire family. Your contributions will support our mobile classroom, Your contribution is 100% deductible. 100% of all donations will go directly into the foundation and our mobile project. If,we do not reach our goal any money we receive will go towards more machines to teach lapidary. All of our jewelry that you will receive as a gift will come with a lifetime guarantee on craftmansship. If,you choose to opt out of the gratis we can donate the item to another foundation of your choice.

Please help us to help others. Give today and we will help others to change their lives in a new and exciting career in jewelry design.

 Thank you in advance for your support.

Montana Redsky

Skyvell jewelry foundation for the lapidary arts

story:
FAQs


Q: What do you mean by customization?

A: Each story is unique to your child’s name. The premise of the story is your child meeting different characters based on his/her name and then discovering how to spell their name. So the story and the characters that your child meets is unique to his/her name and also in the end, their name is displayed boldly, congratulating them for having discovered the spelling to their name.

Q: What kind of book will you deliver? What is the quality of the book?

A: All our printed books are hard bound with puff and we use high quality art paper for printing the inner pages. All pages are centre pinned.

Q: What are the size dimensions of the printed book?

A: The book has landscape orientation. In folded state, the dimensions from end to end horizontally are 11.69 inches. In open state, the dimensions horizontally are 23.38 inches.

Simply put, in folded position, the book is a4 size paper in landscape orientation. In open position it is two a4 papers in horizontal position.

Q: Is the story unique to my child?

A: The story is unique to your child’s name. If your child shares his/her name with another child, there could be chances that they might meet the same set of characters. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Your support and help in spreading the word are truly appreciated. Tell everyone you know aboutStory31 and this campaign so we can reach as many kids as possible!

story:
As-salaamu Alaykum,

I am Imam Daayiee Abdullah, executive director of MECCA Institute, a new online, progressive and inclusive Islamic theological school, hosting Islamic scholars, religious leaders and social justice activists from across the globe. Over the decades, I have worked on many social justice issues, including those related to race, gender, sexuality and religious tolerance, as well as changing how Muslims and non-Muslims understand Islam. In doing this work, I have traveled extensively around the world, including Muslim countries in both the Middle East and Asia. Eventually, my activist background, my social justice work, and my faith in Islam, converged in my understanding that now is the time for a new Islamic renaissance. 

                We muslims are at a dramatic point within our collective history.

  • Some Muslims are questioning how our Islamic faith became so distorted--whether under a Muslim or non-Muslim form of government.

  • Some Muslims question the use of antiquated legalistic approaches to solve our modern circumstances and constraints.
  • Other Muslims report that their local community resources often fail to respond to the depth of their concerns. And the list goes on and on.

So, for the past five years I have focused my efforts into building an inclusive and progressive Islamic education. Then, in January 2014, I had a vision to start an online center of Islamic learning and contemporary Islamic research. And today, I am excited that MECCA Institute is a 501(c)3 organization that will begin offering classes this fall.

MECCA’s scholars recognize that, worldwide, far too many Muslims confuse “ilm” (book knowledge) and “ma'rifat” (spiritual knowing). Knowing the difference between the two, and how to balance them, are major lessons inclusive Muslims must teach and learn today. This is MECCA Institute’s purpose.

MECCA will create contemporary pathways towards a better world through spiritual renewal and intellectual reform. We welcome one and all, Muslim and non-Muslim, to learn more and develop a deeper understanding of Islam.

Our online, global learning center will cost approximately $1.5 million to run for the first 3 years. This will fund our administrative staff, instructors, technological needs,  think tank research and virtual and in-person conferences dedicated to contemporary, progressive and inclusive Islamic thought. 

Our request is that you join us in the effort to reach our crowd funding goal of $100,000. 

We are asking for your help to get MECCA Institute started, assuring that MECCA’s message is globally accessible. Our start-up expenses include equipment for our administrative office, securing and setting up our online learning management system for the school, funding for our initial think tank research, and initial administrative costs.  These funds will help us launch and begin offering classes this fall. We have recently partnered with SocialGood to fiscally sponsor us during this start-up period, providing us with administrative and fiscal support as we move through this nascent phase. (Your tax-deductible contribution will be acknowledged with an email from FirstGiving stating that your contribution was made to SocialGood, our fiscal sponsor.) 

Soon, we will open registration for classes beginning in September. So you and your friends can register or send someone to take a class. If you are a progressive and inclusive scholar, contact us to teach a course. Tell the world that MECCA Institute is the place of spiritual and intellectual diversity where people can evolve.

May our Creator continue to guide and bless us all, Amen.

story:
Hello and thanks for visiting my page.

My name is Yiannis and I am 15. In September I'll being attending Year 11 and by the end of it complete my very important GCSE exams.

One of my favourite chosen subject is music. My passion is rapping and I believe I'm quite good at it - my teachers and other people tell me so :-)

Next Year my school has organised a trip for a small group of students specialising in Performing Arts to visit New York and not only I have the chance to get a taste of the culture and practice our social skills but mainly have the chance to perform and participate in workshops related to music, dance, acting, singling.

I'm so excited that I have been selected to participate in this educational trip plus visiting New York is my life long dream.

However, the participants need to finance this trip themselves and that's where I need your support.

Tickets, accommodation, insurance, workshops, excursions, meals etc. require an investment of £1700 which I need to raise by the beginning of the coming school year.

If you are inspired to make this dream of mine come true I will be forever grateful plus I have included some special perks.

Every little helps and if you are unable to do so at this point please share this page with your friends and family in case they would be happy to support.

In any case I want to THANK YOU for reading this and for your good wishes in my effort to succeed with this endeavour.

story:
1. Introduction: #BeAHero

As a school teacher, my wife Lauren has always tried to help her students know that each of them have the power to make a difference in the world. Each year, their class name is The Heroes. Apart from decorating the walls with superheroes, she teaches them to "be a hero" for someone else in need through service. We have decided to name our campaign #BeAHero, because you too can be a hero to the children in Southern Mexico. 

This last year, her school’s 3rd graders put on a talent show to raise money to help build a school in Chiapas, Mexico. When we went down to Chiapas this summer to see the schools we helped fund, we were deeply touched. The children and community leaders were so gracious and thankful. We want to rally your support to eliminate poverty, empower children, and eradicate the school shortage one school at a time. 

2. Your Donations

Every dollar you donate, up to $10,000, will be matched by a private committed US donor. The money you donate will help us build two High Schools in Reforma and a classroom in Benemerito de las Casas that we wouldn't be able to build without your help! 

The Chiapas government is very grateful for Escalera's efforts. Recently, Escalera finished building 31 classrooms, and they have partnered with the government to build 29 more. They need our help to make that happen. Every dollar you give will be matched with THREE DOLLARS from the Chiapas government. 

This means that if we are successful, the $10,000 we raise will be matched to make $20,000 from a US donor, which will multiply to $80,000 USD with the matching from the Chiapas government. Based on the 2014 average income in Chiapas of $225 pesos per day (~$13.50 USD), this would take 10 people working full-time for about 2.5 YEARS to earn! 

3. Our Story

My wife and I just moved back to my hometown, Austin, TX, after I graduated from BYU just a couple of months ago. We have almost been married for about a year, and we are expecting a baby girl this December! My wife is a schoolteacher and I am a real estate developer; we are both fluent in Spanish and equally passionate about eliminating poverty and creating opportunity through education. 

Five years ago, I lived in Mexico for two years. I spent all my time helping people in their families, communities, and local church congregations. When I left I returned to Brigham Young University to study finance and real estate. I had resolved to give back to the people in Mexico, but I didn’t know where to start. 

As soon as my wife, Lauren, and I found Escalera Foundation, we knew it was a great opportunity to be able to get involved and help raise enough money to make a difference in these kids’ lives.

Chiapas is the poorest state in Mexico, which makes Chiapas is the perfect place to start building schools. Their are numerous small villages that I have even lived in without access to any schools and...WE CAN CHANGE THAT. 

We know that education is the means by which the economy can grow, families can be stronger and communities can be successful.

4. About Escalera

Escalera's 15-year history of work in education has touched the lives of thousands of young students in Mexico.  A long time ago, Escalera discovered that students were not attending high school because they could not even access middle schools - located hours away from their remote mountain villages. In response, Escalera built its first school in 2007. It was expensive and took six months to build. A year later, Escalera pioneered a prefabricated school model - which was almost half the cost and only took three weeks to build. 

Apart from building schools, Escalera is actively involved in impact-investing program, REACH. that trains parents, teachers, and mentors for the students to support them through basic education and on through high school. 

5. Get Involved!

You can help us by sharing this campaign with your friends. Spread the word #BeAHero on Facebook or Twitter. Share our photos on Instagram and our videos on YouTube and Vimeo.

You could even do a fundraising campaign yourself just like this one or the one that Lone Peak High School did a few months back (see video gallery). 

Stay connected. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and Instagram to stay up-to-date on the #BeAHero campaign.

If you want to experience how it feels to #BeAHero you are always welcome to come down to Mexico and visit the schools once they’re done. Chiapas is an incredible place and so is its people (including the Escalera Team)!

story:
“Passion is lifted from the earth itself by the muddy hands of the young; it travels along grass-stained sleeves to the heart. If we are going to save environmentalism and the environment, we must also save an endangered indicator species: the child in nature.” 

Richard Louv, Last Child in the Woods: Saving Our Children from Nature-Deficit Disorder

OUR MISSION
Langley Forest School is dedicated to fostering self-discovery and environmental awareness by allowing children to reconnect with nature through play and place-based, holistic learning experiences. 

Our mission is to reconnect children with our ever changing environment, while creating a base of knowledge surrounding the importance of community and sustainability. Our village-minded school meets a child's needs for self-esteem and leadership skills, in addition to meeting a community need for alternative early learning options.

OUR CORE VALUES

Play-based learning
We believe that children should be allowed to develop at their own pace and to the fullest of their ability.​ We believe that by having choice in play, they learn and grow in their own unique way.​ 

Environmental Sustainability
We believe that it is our responsibility to care for and protect our environment. We believe that this desire to preserve our natural spaces begins by developing our innate curiosities and nurturing our bodies by spending as much time outside as possible. 

Parent Involvement
We believe that parent involvement in preschool fosters a child’s sense of self-worth and security, and strengthens parenting skills. We value the importance of family and community in our children’s development. 

Community Involvement
We believe in the importance of family and active participation in the community. 

WHY FOREST SCHOOL?

We believe that today's children are spending less time outside and more time indoors engaged in technology-driven activities. 

We believe that as parents and educators, it is our responsibility to steer our children away from this "nature-deficit-disorder" (LOUV, 2005).

Since launching our forest school pilot program in September 2014, enrolment has more than doubled and interest in our school continues to grow. Now, in our second year, we have opened the forest to our first Kindergarten class. 

BENEFITS OF FOREST SCHOOL

  • Improves environmental, physical, emotional and mental health
  • Develops fine and gross motor skills
  • Increases understanding of and appreciation for nature
  • Augments ecological literacy
  • Makes additional resources available for managing difficult behaviours
  • Accommodates multiple learning styles
  • Affordable and community-enhancing way to deal with school space issues
  • Promotes safe risk-taking, and reduces harmful and hazardous behaviours
  • Creates sustainable and healthy communities
  • Encourages problem-solving skills
  • Improves communication skills
  • Creates engaged and passionate learners
  • Motivates engaged and passionate educators
  • Supports creative and imaginative thinking
  • Empowers learners
  • Boosts self-esteem
  • Increases “school readiness” (when children transition into traditional school environments)
  • Provides greater concentration skills
  • Students experience fewer sick days


HOW YOU CAN HELP
For the past 50 years, Langley Forest School (previously known as Happy Hours Parent Participation Preschool) has been run by a group of dedicated and passionate volunteer parents, with funding stemming from the tireless efforts of our families. 

GOAL: $10,000 

Construction is underway, and Campaign 2.0 will bring much needed funds to help us complete the build of our first YURT!

Your donations, from $1 to $2,500, will ensure that our goals are met. Donations of $25 or more will receive a charitable donation receipt for tax purposes.

YOUR FUNDING AT WORK

Funds from Campaign 1.0 helped us: 

  • Hire our first Kindergarten teacher, and
  • Purchase new supplies and equipment (tents, outdoor tools, stationery and wilderness First Aid kits)


PERKS FOR YOU

All funders will receive recognition on our website donor page and an invitation to the opening of our new yurt in the Fall of 2015.

$5 :: Discoverer

  • A tremendous amount of gratitude!

$25 :: Believer
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School

$50 :: Advocate
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School
  • A limited edition Langley Forest School t-shirt
  • Recognition of your support via our Facebook page

$100 :: Crusador
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School
  • A limited edition Langley Forest School t-shirt
  • Recognition of your support via our Facebook page

$250 :: Arborist
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School
  • A limited edition Langley Forest School t-shirt
  • 5 trees planted in your honour via Tree Canada
  • Recognition of your support via our Facebook page

$500 :: Creator

  • A tree cookie will be engraved with donor name and displayed at our yurt site
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School
  • 10 trees planted in your honour via Tree Canada
  • Two complimentary tickets to our 2016 Gala
  • Recognition of your support via our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter accounts

$1000 :: Scholar

  • Stones will be displayed in our garden, dedicating the green space after donors
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School
  • 15 trees planted in your honour via Tree Canada
  • Two complimentary tickets to our 2016 Gala
  • Recognition of your support via our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter accounts

$5000 :: Visionary
  •  A scholarship in donors name to pay for one preschool student to attend the program, twice a week. Scholarship will be to help children who would not otherwise be able to attend our school
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School
  • 30 trees planted in your honour via Tree Canada
  • Two complimentary tickets to our 2016 Gala
  • Recognition of your support via our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter accounts

$10000 :: Mountaineer

  • The yurt will be named after the donor and an engraved sign will be in place at the site
  • A special website Thank You from the children of Langley Forest School
  • 40 trees planted in your honour via Tree Canada
  • Four complimentary tickets to our 2016 Gala
  • Recognition of your support via our Facebook, Instagram and Twitter accounts

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP
As a non-profit organization we understand that sometimes donating just isn't possible. However, you can still help! Please help us get the word out about our phenomenal school: 

  • LIKE our Facebook page
  • FOLLOW us on Twitter
  • FOLLOW us on Instagram
story_txt:
“Passion is lifted from the earth itself by the muddy hands of the young; it travels along grass-stained sleeves to the heart. If we are going to save environmentalism and the environment, we must also save an endangered indicator species: the child in nature.” Richard Louv, Last Child in the Woods: Saving Our Children from Nature-Deficit DisorderOUR MISSIONLangley Forest School is dedicated to fostering self-discovery and environmental awareness by allowing children to reconnect with nature through play and place-based, holistic learning experiences. 

Our mission is to reconnect children with our ever changing environment, while creating a base of knowledge surrounding the importance of community and sustainability. Our village-minded school meets a child's needs for self-esteem and leadership skills, in addition to meeting a community need for alternative early learning options.OUR CORE VALUESPlay-based learningWe believe that children should be allowed to develop at their own pace and to the fullest of their ability.​ We believe that by having choice in play, they learn and grow in their own unique way.​ Environmental SustainabilityWe believe that it is our responsibility to care for and protect our environment. We believe that this desire to preserve our natural spaces begins by developing our innate curiosities and nurturing our bodies by spending as much time outside as possible. Parent InvolvementWe believe that parent involvement in preschool fosters a child’s sense of self-worth and security, and strengthens parenting skills. We value the importance of family and community in our children’s development. Community InvolvementWe believe in the importance of family and active participation in the community. WHY FOREST SCHOOL?
We believe that today's children are spending less time outside and more time indoors engaged in technology-driven activities. We believe that as parents and educators, it is our responsibility to steer our children away from this "nature-deficit-disorder" (LOUV, 2005).Since launching our forest school pilot program in September 2014, enrolment has more than doubled and interest in our school continues to grow. Now, in our second year, we have opened the forest to our first Kindergarten class. 
BENEFITS OF FOREST SCHOOL

Improves environmental, physical, emotional and mental health
Develops fine and gross motor skills
Increases understanding of and appreciation for nature
Augments ecological literacy
Makes additional resources available for managing difficult behaviours
Accommodates multiple learning styles
Affordable and community-enhancing way to deal with school space issues
Promotes safe risk-taking, and reduces harmful and hazardous behaviours
Creates sustainable and healthy communities
Encourages problem-solving skills
Improves communication skills
Creates engaged and passionate learners
Motivates engaged and passionate educators
Supports creative and imaginative thinking
Empowers learners
Boosts self-esteem
Increases “school readiness” (when children transition into traditional school environments)
Provides greater concentration skills
Students experience fewer sick days


HOW YOU CAN HELPFor the past 50 years, Langley Forest School (previously known as Happy Hours Parent Participation Preschool) has been run by a group of dedicated and passionate volunteer parents, with funding stemming from the tireless efforts of our families. 

GOAL: $10,000 
Construction is underway, and Campaign 2.0 will bring much needed funds to help us complete the build of our first YURT!


Your donations, from $1 to $2,500, will ensure that our goals are met. Donations of $25 or more will receive a charitable donation receipt for tax purposes.

Hire our first Kindergarten teacher, and
Purchase new supplies and equipment (tents, outdoor tools, stationery and wilderness First Aid kits)

PERKS FOR YOU
